loans.name: Arsen

texts.en:
Arsen is 23 years old and he lives in Dilijan city. He is married and has a pretty daughter.

Arsen is a very hard worker, and with great effort he earns his family's living. Arsen’s father is in the Russian Federation and he does different construction work and also supports his family financially from there. Arsen has a great dream to have a car, but no matter how hard he works in order to have some savings for that purchase, still he is not able to make his dream come true. So his last hope is Kiva and it's generous lenders.

He asks and hopefully waits for Kiva lenders’ support since he needs 1,000,000 Armenian drams for the purchase of the car he dreams of having.

loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Mengnihol

texts.en:
Mengnihol is a hardworking and industrious woman. She was born in 1988. Mengnihol is married and has 2 little children. Her husband is a worker. 

Mengnihol lives with her family in an agricultural region. Many people of her region are busy with growing agricultural products. Mengnihol also wants to organize her own business growing agricultural products. With this aim, she took part in a course ‘To Get Ahead’ for organizing women and got a certificate.

Mengnihol is asking for a loan of 2,100 USD to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for organizing a new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for organizing a new business

loans.name: Pedro Arley

texts.es:
Pedro es un estudiante de enfermería, pasa a tercer semestre y quiere seguir con su carrera porque su familia lo apoya para que sea una persona de bien. El desea terminar este técnico en auxiliar de enfermería y poder tener unas bases para entrar a una universidad más preparado y capaz de enfrentar lo que viene. 
Pedro hace esto porque le gusta ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan y para un proyecto de vida, ser cada vez mejor y ser jefe de enfermería , cuando termine esta carrera hacer una especialización en lo que más le llame la atención.
Para terminar le da gracias a su familia que lo ha apoyado  en todo este proceso y a campo alto por abrirle esta puertas y darle una oportunidad tan grande. 
Gracias
texts.en: Pedro is a nursing student. He is entering third semester and wants to continue with his career studies because his family supports him so that he can be a successful person. He wishes to finish his nursing assistant courses so that he has the basis to enter the university better prepared and capable of the upcoming coursework. Pedro has selected this career because he like helping people who need it and as a life project. He wants to be better every time and be chief of nursing, and when he finishes this career he will specialize in an area of interest. To finish, he is thankful to his family who has supported him through this entire process and to Campoalto for opening the doors and providing this great opportunity. Thank you.

loans.use: to pay school tuition.

loans.name: Jennifer Catalina

texts.es:
Jennifer es una persona que quiere estudiar administración en salud, no han podido por falta de recursos económicos, ella  quiere salir a delante sin ayuda de nada o de nadie.
Jennifer tiene como proyección a corto plazo poder servirle a la ciudadanía para poderle aclarar sus dudas, quejas y sugerencias con respecto a la salud, sus derechos y deberes, a largo plazo quiere ser una de las personas que tomen en cuenta el problema o falencias que la salud tiene,  para una mejora continua en Colombia y a si poder  ser en un futuro una gerente de hospital. 
Durante el proceso que tuvo con campo alto se puso dar cuenta la importancia y lo interesante de conocer la evolución que ha tenido el sector salud, también aprendió a valorar el estudio y los conocimientos que le han brindado las personas capacitadas.
Ella quiere ayudar a solucionar los conflictos o diferencias que ay en la salud y para eso ella quiere llegar a ser gerente en auditoria en salud para tratar de cambiar las opciones que tienen los usuarios en el supuesto manejo de la salud.
texts.en:
Jennifer wants to study Health Administration, but she hasn't been able to due a lack of economic resources. She wants to get ahead without needing to depend on anyone or anything.  Jennifer's short-term goals involve being able to serve her fellow citizens, helping them to clear up their doubts, complaints, and suggestions regarding their health, their rights, or their responsibilities. In the longer term, she wants to be someone who deals with the problems and shortcomings that the majority of Colombians still face, hopefully in the role of a hospital manager.

During her time as a student at Campo Alto, she has learned the importance and the interest in knowing the evolution that the health sector has experienced. She has also learned to appreciate her studies and the knowledge that trained people have provided her with.  Jennifer wants help solve the conflicts and differences in health, and to do this, she wants to be the manager of a health business office so that she can try and change user opinion regarding the management of their health.

loans.use: become a manager of Health Administration.

loans.name: Sandy Tatiana

texts.es:
Sandy Tatiana es una niña con 16 años desea estudiar para ser alguien más en su vida, ella es una chica responsable con su estudio y además quiere estudiar  auxiliar de enfermería en las instalaciones de campo alto.
Ella pide la colaboración de kiva para que le ayuden a cumplir sus sueños, ya que la familia es de bajos recursos y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
La niña Sandy Tatiana agradece enormemente su colaboración ya que ella es una persona que va para su tercer semestre de enfermería ya que ella en el transcurso del tiempo ha aprendido muchas cosas y se ha dado cuenta que le gusta la enfermería, pero ella tiene una meta mas grande que es llegar a la jefe de enfermería  y quiere cumplir este sueño, por ese motivo quiere esforzarse más, cuyo motivo es que vive con su mama y su hermana  y su padre no les ayuda económicamente.
texts.en:
Sandy Tatiana is a young girl, age 16, who wants to study in order to better her life.  She is a girl who is responsible with her schoolwork, and she also wants to study at the Campo Alto facilities to become a nursing assistant.

She is asking for Kiva's participation to help her to achieve her dreams, as her family has few resources, so that she can  have a better quality of life. Sandy Tatiana is very grateful for Kiva’s help. 

Because she is going into the third semester of nursing school, she has learned a lot.  She has realized that she likes nursing, but she has a bigger goal, which is to become a head of nursing.  She wants to fulfill that dream, and this is the reason that she wants to try harder.  Her motivation is that she lives with her mother and her sister, and her father does not help them financially.

loans.use: to be a student.

loans.name: Dúo El Misperal De San Bartolo| Group

texts.es:
Dúo Misperal de San Bartolo
Doña Maricela, ella tiene 34 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de orquídeas en el mercado la cuchilla ubicado en San Bartolomé Milpas Altas desde hace muchos años, ella está solicitando el crédito para compra de macetas, orquídeas, y fibra de coco con el propósito de presentar mejor sus orquídeas, su anhelo es seguir creciendo su jardín y tener toda la variedad posible de orquídeas,ella ya ha trabajado un credito anterior el cual pago con mucha responsabilidad y no cayo en mora.
texts.en:
Dúo Misperal de San Bartolo

Maricela is  34 years old and sells orchids in the La Cuchilla market, located in San Bartolomé Milpas Altas for many years.  She is asking for this loan to buy flower pots, orchids, and coconut fiber so she can better present her orchids.  She wants to  continue growing her garden and have all variety of orchids.  She has had a previous loan and she paid it responsibly without falling behind.

loans.use: to buy flower pots, orchids, and coconut fibre.

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef is a 20-year-old single young man from a small village near Nablus city.  He lives with his family in a small simple house.  His father works as an employee in a local firm.  This is the only source of income for the family. Yousef is a student in the university where he studies Arabic Literature.  He would like to finish his studies and earn a BA degree and find a job. 

Yousef took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester.  By taking this loan, Yousef will be able to complete his studies as soon as possible and find a job. 

Yousef appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Brigite

texts.es: Ella es Brigite, quiere estudiar para tener un futuro exitoso, actualmente tiene  proyecto de aprendizaje con el  motivo de prepararse para tener experiencia en Mercadeo con el fin de brindar lo mejor para su mama y sus hijos quienes son su razón de ser, desea enseñarles a sus hijos la importancia del estudio, desea ser motivo de orgullo y ejemplo a seguir para su familia, ya que a pesar de todos los inconvenientes presentados las ganas de superarse como persona espiritual y profesional son más grandes que todos los problemas que puedan ocurrir. Su mayor motivación es su familia y todos aquellos que la rodean y están dispuestos a ayudarla siempre, sueña con tener su propio negocio y ser profesional en el campo del mercadeo, Campo alto le brinda la oportunidad de formarse no solo como persona sino también intelectualmente, en su trabajo actual puede poner en practica todos los conocimientos adquiridos, ella ha estudiado muy fuerte para llegar a donde esta y la idea de no poder continuar con su estudio por su economía actual la pone muy triste, pero sabe que con la ayuda de KIVA ella seguirá  luchando por cada día ser la mejor, en el transcurso de su programa ha conocido y compartido con personas hermosas que han aportado mucho para su preparación académica y personal, ha  encontrado el significado de la vida en los pequeños detalles, de cada día vivido siempre le queda un lección una experiencia mas, ya se ha enfrentado con la realidad de saber que no todo lo que ella soñaba de la vida, es así. Sabe que por cada meta que anhele con su  corazón debe trabajar fuertemente sin rendirse nuca. Brigite confía en que sus sueños se harán realidad, porque ningún soñador es pequeño y ningún sueño es demasiado grande para no cumplirse, agradece todos los días a la vida y a Dios la oportunidad de un nuevo día, de una familia, un techo, y una institución donde formarse.
texts.en:
This is Brigite. She wants to study in order to have a successful future. She wants to learn, with the goal of preparing herself to have experience in trade. Her goal is to provide the best to her mother and children, who are her reason for being. She wants to teach her children the importance of education. She wants to be the object of their pride and an example to follow. Despite her challenges, she wants to succeed spiritually and professionally; this desire is greater than any problem that could happen.
Her greatest motivation is her family and all who surround her and are always willing to help her. She dreams of having her own business and being a business professional. 
Campo Alto is offering her the opportunity to learn, not just personally but intellectually. In her current work she can put all her acquired knowledge into practice. She has studied very hard to get to where she is, and the idea of not being able to continue her studies because of finances makes her very sad. But she knows that with the help of Kiva, she will keep fighting to be the best every day. 
During her program she has gotten to know and share with lovely people who have greatly contributed to her academic and personal development. She has found the meaning of life in the small details. In each day lived there is always a lesson for her and another experience. She has confronted the reality of knowing that not everything she has dreamed for her life will be that way. She knows that for each of her heart's goals she needs to work hard without ever giving in.
Brigite trusts that her dreams will be made reality, because no dreamer is small and no dream is too big to achieve. She is thankful for life every day, and thankful to God for the opportunity in a new day, for a family, for a roof, and for an educational institution in which to learn.

loans.use: to finish her studies.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith es una joven que estudia auxiliar de enfermería tiene proyectos a futuro sueña con terminar su estudios y estudiar enfermería profesional. 
Ella vive con su madre y sus hermanos, su madre es un gran apoyo para ella pues le paga sus estudios y esta siempre con ella.
Kiva seria un gran apoyo para la mama de Edith, pues a si ella podría seguir pagando sus estudios y poder lograr que su hija sea una profesional.
Edith se encuentra en apuros por no saber de que forma lograra su madre pagarle sus estudios, pues ella se encuentra en una etapa primordial de sus estudios, pues entra próximamente a realizar sus prácticas para poder finalizar su carrera  en técnico auxiliar de enfermería.
Su madre es el único sustento  con el que Edith cuenta  y ya que los recursos financieros de su madre no pueden suplir sus estudios, kiva seria de gran ayuda para realizar los sueños de Edith y su madre.
Edith tiene el sueño de terminar sus estudios y a provechar su conocimiento para darle a su madre lo que ella lo que ella aun no ha podido conseguir.
texts.en:
Edith is young woman who is studying to be a nursing assistant.  She has future plans, and dreams of finishing school and studying to be a nurse.  She lives with her mother and siblings.  Her mother is a great help to her.  She pays for Edith's school and is always with her.  

A Kiva loan would provide great support to Edith's mother--she'd be able to keep paying for school and ensure that her daughter becomes a professional.

Edith is in a tight spot because she doesn't know how her mother will be able to pay for school.  She's at a vital stage of her studies because she'll soon begin her internship to finish her nursing assistant degree.

Edith's mother is her only support and because her mother's financial resources aren't sufficient to pay for school, a Kiva loan would really help Edith and her mother realize their dream.  

"Edith dreams of finishing school and using her knowledge to give her mother what she has not been able to obtain thus far."

loans.use: to pay for education.

loans.name: Angie Daniela

texts.es:
Angie Daniela quiere ser enfermera,  para ayudar a los niños que presentan problemas de salud, va a entrar a tercer semestre, donde debe realizar sus prácticas laborales, pero no cuenta con el apoyo financiero de su familia ya que su madre falleció hace poco y necesita un aporte económico de alguna entidad o persona para poder culminar su estudio técnico y mejorar de esta forma su calidad de vida y poder independizarse como persona profesional. 
Ella sabe que lo que está estudiando es solo el principio de su carrera profesional  que le llevara mucho sacrificio completar, quiere llegar a ser fisioterapeuta.
Ella estudia hace un año en campo alto, el nivel académico ha sido bueno y ha aprendido cosas fundamentales para la vida y su vida profesional. 
Los profesores han sido personas muy idóneas en su trabajo  y muy profesionales, ha conocido toda clase de personas que quieren salir adelante y estudiar para lograrlo.
Campo alto permite que personas como angie Daniela con bajos recursos puedan culminar una carrera con el apoyo del  plan de gestores de crecimiento.
texts.en:
Angie Daniela wants to be a nurse in order to help children who have health problems. She will enter her third semester, where she has to undertake practical work. However, she can not count on financial help from her family since her mother died recently. She needs economic assistance from any place or person in order to be able to complete her technical studies and to improve her quality of life and be able to become an independent professional.
She knows that what she is studying is only the beginning of her professional career, which requires a great deal of sacrifice to complete. She wants to become a physiotherapist.
She has studied for a year at the Campoalto Institute. Her academic level has been good and she has learned fundamental aspects for her professional and personal life. The teachers have been ideal people in her work and very professional. She has known all kinds of people who wish to get ahead and are studying to succeed in life.
Campoalto allows people like Angie Daniela with limited means to achieve a career with the support of a management growth plan.

loans.use: to pay for education costs

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is 29 years old and from the Kaspi district. She is married and lives with her two young children, in-laws and husband. Nadia’s husband works as a construction worker locally and gets a small wage. Her parents-in-law are employed at the local public school and they have monthly salaries as well. 

Nadia stays home and takes care of her family. She is an excellent mother and housewife who tries to give her children all the best. Nadia is sad that she is not able to generate income for the family, so that is why she has decided to start her own business and purchase clothing and linens for resale. She will sell the items from her house to her community members. The increased profit will be reinvested in the same business, and Nadia will be able to continue the business. Nadia believes in your kindness.

loans.use: to start trading in clothing and linens

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of 2 children. Her husband owns a toy shop which is the only source of income for the family. He sell a variety of toys in his shop. Presently he is in need of purchasing a variety of toys to sell. However, due to lack of finances, he finds it difficult.

Therefore, Samina has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase toys for her husband's shop. She is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for the business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of toys to sell

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Nusrat is a 32-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan and is the mother of 4 children. Her husband is the only person earning in the family. He manufactures plastic goods and sells them in the main market. He needs capital for purchasing a molding machine to manufacture plastic to sell however, due to financial constraints, he finds it difficult.

Therefore, his wife Nusrat has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband. The loan amount would be very helpful for her husband's work as by purchasing a molding machine, he will save time for manufacturing more plastic to sell.  Nusrat would save money for future needs. Nusrat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a molding machine for manufacturing plastic goods

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a married man, aged 42 with all four children attending school.  He lives in a rural setting with his family.  He is a farmer who grows beans, maize, coffee and banana plantations and also carries out cloth back trading as his side business.  He started his business in 2000.

He works six days a week and eight hours per day.  He started his business to increase his family's income, get food for his family and get school fees for his children.  He acquired this loan to boost his agricultural business so he can buy manure, herbicides and pesticides for the gardens.  He hopes this will improve his productivity in the long run. His clients are traders from his village and those from different towns.

His hopes for the future are to expand his business and be the leading supplier of agricultural products in his village.  The challenges he faces are the delayed payments from the clients he supplies.  He describes himself as a hardworking man who appreciates the services of lenders and through these services, different communities have developed.

loans.use: To buy organic manure, herbicides and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, charcoal, fish, onion, meat, oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, Maggi cubes, rice, and onion for her business.

loans.name: Saidbek

texts.ru: Саидбек живет в городе Вахдат. Ему 31 год. Он семейный человек. Саидбек работает наемным рабочим. Сейчас он собирается начать новый бизнес и выбрал для этого куплю-продажу крупнорогатого скота. Саидбек считает это прибыльным бизнесом, не требующим тяжелой работы. Он накопил сбережение в размере 600 долларов США, а также построил хороший коровник. Для купли скота он просит кредит. Саидбек на сумму кредита хочет закупить 4 голов молодых бычков, откармливать их в течение месяца. Благодаря кредиту у него будет постоянная работа, приносящая хорошую прибыль.
texts.en: Saidbek lives in Vahdat. He is 31 years old. He is a family man. Saidbek works as a hired laborer. Now, he plans to start a new business and has chosen to get into the purchase and sale of cattle. Saidbek considers it a lucrative business that doesn't require heavy labor. He has accumulated savings of $600, and also built a good barn. He is requesting a loan to purchase cattle. For the amount of the loan, Saidbek wants to buy four steers and fatten them for a month. Thanks to the loan, he will have a permanent job bringing a good income.

loans.use: to buy four steers to start a business buying and selling cattle

loans.name: Amiran

texts.en:
Amiran is from the village of Jikhaishi in the Khoni region. He lives with his wife, son, and daughter-in-law. His wife works as a worker at the greenhouse and that's the only source for the family's income. Her salary, however, is not enough to meet the basic needs of the family. The family belongs to the subsistence poor category as they have no source of sufficient income and live under poverty.

According to situation mentioned above, Amiran is not able to receive credit from the local financial providers for starting a business.  No other members of the family are employed, so Amiran decided to start his own agricultural activity in order to more effectively meet the daily costs of his family. A loan of 1,000 GEL will be a great support to this hardworking man and his family, enabling him to purchase cattle, take care of them and get some income from their products.

Amiran and his family rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Stepan

texts.en:
Stepan is 38 years old and he lives in Dilijan city. He is not married and he lives with his mother. She is already retired and Stepan is the only breadwinner in his small family.

He is a worker and his salary is hardly enough for their everyday needs and food. As Stepan says, he would like to repair their flat, but he cannot realize his plan since they are short of money. Stepan wants somehow to make his mother’s life more comfortable.

He asks for a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams in order to buy living room furniture for their flat, which will be a great and nice surprise for his mother.

loans.use: to buy living room furniture for their flat

loans.name: María Carmenza

texts.es:
Carmenza se ha caracterizado entre sus clientes como una mujer amable y carismática, con 51 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio, pues tiene un puesto de venta ambulante que comenzó hace aproximadamente un año; allí ofrece mecato, cigarrillos, dulces, minutos a celular, entre otros y tiene la ventaja de tener una muy buena ubicación, pues se encuentra en el parque principal del municipio donde reside. Su experiencia la obtuvo trabajando en diferentes tiendas y almacenes, por lo que su conocimiento en el manejo de comercio es amplio.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor (mecato, galletería, dulces, cigarrillos, entre otros), así tendrá más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes y satisfacer los diferentes gustos y necesidades; lo que le generará mejores ventas e ingresos para seguir luchando para cumplir su propósito a mediano plazo, que es montar una tienda de abarrotes bien ubicada, en la que pueda evitar los riesgos a los que está expuesta y que le genere mayor rentabilidad para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carmenza is known by her customers as an amiable and charismatic woman. She is 51 and has had her own stall for one year. She sells snacks, cigarettes, sweets, prepaid phone cards, and other things. Her stall is very well located, in the main park of her town. She gathered a lot of experience while working for several shops and grocery stores, so she has ample knowledge of being a saleswoman. She asks for a loan in order to buy merchandise wholesale (snacks, biscuits, sweets, and cigarettes, among others), as she wants to have a greater variety of products on offer to have as many varied customers as possible. Her aim is to increase her sales and her income so as to achieve her medium-term goal of setting up a grocery shop in a good location. Having a real shop would protect her from many risks she actually runs and would also be more profitable. Her dream is to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale.

loans.name: Nigina

texts.en:
Nigina is a kind woman. She is 37 years old, a widow and has 2 children. One of her children is an adult and one of them is a non-adult.

Nigina has a higher education. She is a teacher and works in a school in her region. Nigina always wanted to give her children a higher education. Her son is a student in the first course of Tajik State University. Nigina must pay for the education of her son, but she does not have money. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 TJS to pay for her son's educational tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, a solar charging set, and a weighing scale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Arminda Del Socorro

texts.es: Es una mujer jovial, tiene 45 años de edad, originaria de  Puerto Cabezas, casada, tiene dos hijos, la mayor estudia estilismo y el menor esta culminando sus estudios de secundaria. Desde hace 20 años estableció una pulpería en su vivienda, aun recuerda que solamente tenía 60 córdobas para comprar la leche de su hija, por lo que pensando como reproducir un poco más de dinero, decido invertir su pequeño capital en chivería, después a los tres meses con las ganancias obtenidas le permitieron comprar medio quintal de granos básicos. Actualmente tiene su pulpería en un local, ubicado en un punto estratégico y vende productos de belleza y accesorios para mujeres. Con el propósito de continuar creciendo en su negocio, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos, porque su esposo se encuentra desempleado, solicita financiamiento para comprar:  3 quintales de arroz, un quintal de Harina, un bidón de aceite, 6 cajas de jabones para lavar ropa, 5 docenas de cloro, 7 bolsones de papel higiénico, 2 docenas de toalla sanitarias, 5 libras de soda, 12 docenas de bujía, 3 docenas de sopas instantáneas , 4 libras ristras de pinolillo, cebada, avena, una docena jabones de baño. Su sueño es establecer una distribuidora.
texts.en:
Arminda del Socorro, 45, is a cheerful woman from Puerto Cabezas.  She's married and has two children; the oldest is studying fashion design and the youngest is finishing secondary school.

Arminda del Socorro set up a grocery store in her home 20 years ago.  She still remembers that she had only 60 córdobas to buy milk for her daughter.  She decided to invest her small amount of capital in Chivería products so she could earn a bit more money.  Three months later, her profits enabled her to buy half a quintal of basic grains.

Currently Arminda del Socorro's grocery store is in a strategic location and she also sells beauty products and women's accessories.  It's her only source of income because her husband is out of work, so she's requesting a loan to continue growing in her business.

She's going to buy 3 quintals of rice, 1 quintal of flour, 1 can of oil, 6 boxes of laundry detergent and 1 dozen of bath soap, 5 dozen bottles of bleach, 7 packages of toilet paper and 2 dozen of sanitary napkins, 5 pounds of soda, 12 dozen candles, 3 dozen packages of instant soup, pinolillo [cornmeal and cacao-based beverage], barley, and oatmeal.

Her dream is to set up a distribution business.

loans.use: to stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and a weighing scale to aid his work as a Community Knowledge Worker

loans.name: Sadiqa

texts.en:
Sadiqa, 58, is a married woman. She is the mother of six sons. She has started a clothing business. She wants to support her family through her business. She purchases variety of clothes from different areas and sells them at a profitable price in the main market. 

Presently she needs to purchase more clothes to sell. However, due to a lack of finance, she is facing a problem. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from Kiva and its partner BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Rukia

texts.en: Rukia, age 45, is a mother of seven children. Her husband owns a tailoring shop in the market, which is the only source of income for the family.  He needs to purchase a tailoring machine and a variety of tailoring material for the shop, including threads, needles, clothing, etc.  It is very important for him to continue his work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money he finds it difficult. Therefore his wife, Rukia is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, BRAC Pakistan, with the goal of helping her husband.  He will purchase the things he needs with the help of the loan amount.  Rukia is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan amount. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband purchase a tailoring machine and variety of tailoring material for his shop, including threads, needles, clothing etc.

loans.name: Freedom Group[

texts.en:
Esther and her colleagues are part of the group called Freedom. Esther, who is in her early 40s, is married and has three children; all of them are still at school. 

Esther has been selling fish for eight years. She works from 6:00 am to 6:00 pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Esther's second loan from ID-Ghana. She used the previous loan to buy fish, and she has repaid back her loan successfully. She is happy with the loan and doing great. She used the profit to pay school fees and household expenses, and to invest into her business. 

She will use this new loan to buy more fish and sell to customers. She dreams of owning a cold store so that she can supply fish to people around her area.

Esther will share this loan with her borrowing group members, which has a total of five members. They will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Brian

texts.en:
Brian is a 23 year-old man married and blessed with one child. He mainly deals in cattle fattening and trading, though he also runs a retail shop which is operated by his wife.

He is a young man who has managed to buy farm land, where he grazes his cattle, and also a plot of land which he offers as security for the loan.

Brian has a supportive mother who always looks after the cows. 

He wants a loan to buy more cows for fattening and trading to get enough money for his family, and also pay school fees for his sisters who are in the secondary level.

Brian hopes to be a large-scale farmer owning at least 100 head of cattle in five years.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dried fish and meat for her business.

loans.name: Nimia

texts.es:
La señora Nimia tiene 49 años, vive acompañada con el señor Eulalio. Ella hace más de 10 años se dedica a hacer minutas, tortas, dulces, bocaditos entre otros, y por medio de ese trabajo dignamente se gana la vida de una manera honrada.
Nimia es una persona que siempre se ha esforzado por conseguir sus sueños, es eso lo que la destaca de las demás personas. Su sueño es poder tener un gran local donde vender sus productos.
La Sra. Nimia solicita el préstamo ya que desea comprar insumos para sus comidas, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos, aderezos y demás. Agradece por esta confianza que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo y trabajando. A veces ella cría animales para poder faenarlos y poder hacer sus comidas.
texts.en:
Nimia is 49 years old, and she lives with her partner, Eulalio. She has more than ten years of experience making quick meals, cakes, sweets, and snacks, and through this work she is earning herself a dignified, honorable living.

Nimia has always stretched herself to reach her dreams, and that's what makes her stand out among other people. Her dream is to have a big place where she can sell her products. Nimia is requesting this loan because she wants to buy ingredients for her meals, such as meat, vegetables, condiments, dressings and more. She is grateful for the trust that she has received that lets her keep growing and working. Nimia also raises animals, which she slaughters and uses to make food.

loans.use: buy meats, vegetables, condiments, and more for her food sales

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
15 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, ellas son mujeres muy unidas y trabajadoras, es por eso que este grupo lleva ese nombre, ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, y están hacienda la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza como un medio de conocer la situación de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Silvina, quien se dedica a la venta de frutas, ella es una persona muy humilde que se esfuerza por ir mejorando las condiciones de vida de ella y la de su familia. Su sueño es poder tener un negocio fijo y que sea suyo.
Pide de este préstamo para poder comprar frutas variadas de estación, como ser bananas, manzanas, melones, piñas y demás. Todas están entusiasmadas por recibir las capacitaciones y poder crecer.
texts.en:
There are 15 women who make up this group.  They are united and hardworking women and this is why this group forms part of the elimination of poverty program and its members are taking the elimination of poverty survey as a means to learn each-others situations.

Silvina is one of the members and she sells fruit.  She is a very humble person who makes an effort to improve her and her family’s quality of life.  Her dream is to have a fixed business of her own.

She is asking for this loan to buy seasonal fruit such as bananas, apples, melons, pineapples, and others.  They are all enthusiastic about getting the training and being able to grow.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Porvenir 1 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Porvenir 1 está en su 9° ciclo  del programa de comité, todas se pusieron como metas ayudarse las unas a las otras y por medio de ese esfuerzo poder superar su pobreza, ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza de la fundación paraguaya.
Miryan es una de las integrantes quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo cual a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo irá mejorando su situación de pobreza. Ella comenta que se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas que ella misma hace y vende, cuenta además que se hizo de muy buena clientela ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y gustan mucho a sus clientes. Ella es una mujer muy decidida a salir adelante es por eso que se está esforzando.
Pide este préstamo para comprar los insumos que necesita para hacer sus comidas, como ser carnes, verduras, hortalizas y demás.
texts.en: The group 'Porvenir 1' (the name means 'Future 1') is in its ninth lending cycle with the field partner. All the members have the same goal: to help each other in order to overcome poverty together. Their group is a member of the specific program of the field partner aimed at eradicating poverty. Miryan is one of the members of the group. When she was last surveyed, her level of poverty was very dire. However, thanks to her efforts and her hard work, her situation is improving. She prepares fast-food dishes and sells them, and she has many returning customers who like her food. She is a woman determined to do her utmost to escape poverty. She asks for a loan in order to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare the food she sells, such as meat, vegetables, and the like.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Piruz

texts.en: Piruz is a 53-year-old married man, who lives in the village Ertisi, in the Tetritskaro district. He lives with his mother and wife. Piruz's mother receives monthly assistance from the local government of 150 GEL. To take care of his family's needs, Piruz is engaged in cattle breeding and poultry raising. He realizes income from selling the milk products in the local market, which is the main source of the family's income.  Piruz's wife helps him greatly in his everyday activities related to farming.  To generate more income and earn economic stability for his family, Piruz needs a loan of 2,000 GEL to open a traditional Georgian bakery.  He will bake bread and sell it among villagers.  His request has now been approved within the framework of Kiva and Credo and he is able to use the start up loan for setting up a bakery located near his house.  Piruz and his family members rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain his business.

loans.use: To open a traditional Georgian bakery

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is 28 years old. She lives with her mother near Nablus at Balata camp. Balata Camp is a Palestinian refugee camp established in the northern West Bank in 1950, adjacent to the city of Nablus. It is the largest refugee camp in the West Bank. Aysha works as tailor at a shop near her house. She earns $500 a month and this is the only source of income for her and her mother.

Aysha applied for a loan from Ryada to do some paving work to repair the floor, which will help her to improve her house and make it better. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her.

loans.use: to do some paving work to repair the floor, which will help her to improve her house and make it better

loans.name: Mukhtar

texts.en:
Mukhtar, age 53, is a mother of six children. Her husband owns an embroidery shop in the market, which is the only source of income for the family. He needs to purchase a new variety of embroidery material to resell. However, due to the lack of money he finds it difficult. This will help him to offer more variety to his customers and to continue his work efficiently and professionally. 

For that reason, his wife, Mukhtar, is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, BRAC Pakistan, with the goal of helping her husband.  He will purchase an embroidery machine and a new variety of embroidery materials.  Mukhtar is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan amount. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To help her husband purchase an embroidery machine and a new variety of embroidery materials

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en: Haleema is a 49-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan.  Her husband is the only person earning an income in the family. He is a welder by profession. Presently he needs to purchase welding rods, soldering rods and raw material for making spare parts. However, due to financial constraints he finds it difficult to do so. Therefore his wife Haleema has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband. He will use the loan to purchase a variety of welding goods needed for his work. Haleema is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase welding rods, soldering rods and raw material for making spare parts.

loans.name: Zaitoon

texts.en:
Zaitoon, age 42, is a mother of seven children. Her husband owns a tailoring shop in the market, which is the only source of income for the family. He needs to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of tailoring materials for the shop, including threads, needles, clothing, etc. This is very important for him to continue his work efficiently and professionally. However, due to the lack of money he finds it difficult. 

Therefore, Zaitoon is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband. Her husband will purchase the necessary items with the help of this loan. Zaitoon is feeling happy that she will be able to help her husband with this loan. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of tailoring materials for the shop, including threads, needles, clothing, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beans, dry pepper, peanuts, etc. to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and a weighing scale to aid his work as a Community Knowledge Worker

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian  vive con sus padres. Su madre es ama de casa y su padre es transportista, comenta que su meta es trabajar en lo que va a ser su profesión, y luego después de terminar su carrera poder seguir estudiando para  obtener buenos  ingresos, independizarse  y ayudar a su familia.
Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, con lo cual quiere poder ayudar a las personas que necesiten ayuda en su salud.
Pide este préstamo para usarlo en sus gastos de manutención, como ser pasajes de ómnibus, fotocopias, alimentación, etc. ya que el día a día de un estudiante es muy costoso.
texts.en:
Lilian lives with her parents. Her mother is a housewife and her father is a transporter.

She says that her goal is to work in what will be her profession and then after finishing her degree continue studying to earn a good income, become independent and help her family.

She is studying nursing with which she wants to help people that need help with their health. 

She asks for this loan to help pay with living expenses, such as bus tickets, photocopies, food, etc., as the day to day of a student is very costly.

loans.use: to pay for student's living expenses such as bus tickets, photocopies, food, etc.

loans.name: Srim

texts.en:
Srim is shown in the photograph with her husband and her son, Chrun, aged 20, who is going to enroll in the National University of Management in Phnom Penh. Srim is 39 years old, married and has three children. Srim has been doing farming for the past 20 years on two hectares of farmland. Her aim is to provide all her children with their basic needs and opportunities for education when they graduate from high school level. She wants to see them become professional and have a bright future. 

Due to the family’s economic situation, Srim can hardly cover the costs of her child’s education fees. That is why she is asking for a loan of 1,700 USD to pay for her son's enrollment fee and buy some materials to support his course of study. Her son is interested in a major in banking, which he thinks is suitable for his personality. Srim is very happy and thankful for the Kiva loan program that enables poor students to pursue higher education and contribute to the future development of Cambodia.

loans.use: to pay for her son's enrollment fee and buy some materials to support his course of study.

loans.name: Hursan

texts.en:
A wonderful woman by the name of Hursan lives in a flat which is in bad condition. She is divorced and has no children. She lives alone in the capital of Tajikistan. She works as cook in a state organization. She gets a small salary which is not enough for repairing her flat. She is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to buy building materials for repairing the flat. 

In this way she will be able to offer herself a better quality of life and moral stability that will allow her to progress. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing her house

loans.name: Paulina Marina

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 40 años y desde hace 2 años tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas y cerveza, con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, sobre todo porque es madre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho.

Paulina esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería al por mayor para su negocio, especialmente cerveza ya que en esta época hay mayor consumo, así podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Paulina is 40 years old. She has had her small business for 2 years, selling soda and beer. With the results of her work she can pay for the household expenses. Above all, she is the mother of two children, whom she loves very much.

Paulina is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since with their help she will be able to buy merchandise wholesale for her business, especially beer. At this time of the year, there is more consumption and this way, she can improve her income and keep fighting to make her big dream come true: to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair the closet in the kitchen and paint her house

loans.name: Erika Alejandra

texts.es:
Erika es una mujer emprendedora de 23 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de 4 años. Hace algún tiempo decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar, por ello adecuó un espacio de su casa y montó un pequeño almacén de ropa, en el que trabaja todos los días, sin descuidar su familia, así genera los ingresos para solventar los gastos básicos de su pequeño hijo, quien es el motor principal para seguir luchando día a día.
Su espíritu de superación y sus ganas de fortalecer cada vez más su negocio, la impulsan a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido de mercancía al por mayor (calzado, jeans, blusas, camisas, chaquetas) y una estantería para almacenar y exhibir las prendas; esto le permitirá mejorar la variedad de su inventario para satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes; además estará preparada para atender la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de fin de año; mejorando las ventas y los ingresos que recibe.
Erika manifiesta que su propósito a futuro es poder acreditar bien su negocio y adquirir un local en una zona más comercial, para introducir nuevos artículos como accesorios y cosméticos y así atender un nuevo mercado; generando una mayor rentabilidad para que le permita dar a su hijo una educación con calidad y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de los que ama.
texts.en: Erika is a 23-year-old entrepreneur. She is married and has child of 4. A while ago, she decided to set up her own shop in order to help her husband with household expenses. She dedicates a corner of her house to this shop, where she sells clothes every day. She keeps taking care of her family as well. The income she derives from her shop pays for all her child's basic needs. Her son is her main reason for keeping on fighting. Erika is determined to do her best in order to strengthen her business a bit more every day, which is why she asks for a loan in order to buy merchandise wholesale (shoes, jeans, blouses, shirts, and jackets) as well as shelves to store and display the clothes. She will thus be able to offer a greater variety of products and to meet customer demand. She is ready to meet the increase in demand that comes with the end of the year and hopefully brings more sales and more income. Erika's goal is to garner more reputation and to buy a shop in a more commercial area, in order to expand to other items such as accessories and cosmetics and conquer new markets. She would like her shop to earn more so as to give her child the best possible education and to enjoy a better life together with her loved ones.

loans.use: Comprar surtido de mercancía al por mayor (calzado, jeans, blusas, camisas, chaquetas) y una estantería para almacenar y exhibir las prendas

loans.name: Sabryeh

texts.en:
Sabryeh is 30 years old. She lives with her husband near Nablus in Beit Furik. Beit Furik is a Palestinian town located nine kilometers southeast of Nablus, in the Nablus Governorate in the northern West Bank. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics, the town had a population of 10,339 inhabitants in 2007.

Sabryeh is asking Ryada for this loan to paint her house and install doors and windows, which will help to warm her house, especially now in the winter. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her.

loans.use: to paint her house and install doors and windows, which will help to warm her house, especially now in the winter.

loans.name: Khristo

texts.en:
This is Khristo from the Khelvachauri district in the western part of Georgia. He is married, with two children, and lives with his parents. Kristo’s source of income is a small monthly rent from his own commercial space in his district.  He is unemployed at the moment and is seeking a job, but according to the fact that there is a high unemployment rate in the region, it has become hard for Khristo to get a suitable job. 

In order to generate income and cover the household expenses, Khristo is requesting a loan. If his loan is raised on the Kiva website, Khristo will buy a mini-bus and start working on a bus line. He will carry passengers from his district to a neighboring town and get a service fee. Khristo is an experienced driver and has the appropriate driving license. He hopes he will earn a good income and improve the standard of living for his family members in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a minibus and start working on a bus line

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cookies, yams, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more drinks and cold water by sack for her business

loans.name: Margaret's Group

texts.en:
Margaret is a member of this group and lives in Dansoman. She is 31 years old and married to Benjamin, a carpenter. Together they have two children, ages of 15 and 8, who are in school.

Margaret has been selling fried fish for six years. This is her forth loan cycle with ID Ghana. With the Kiva loan that she receives, she will increase her capital and buy two cartons of fish to fry and sell to customers to earn more money. In the coming years, she would like to buy a plot of land and to see her children in school.

Margaret, together with four others, need a total amount of GHS 5,400 to grow their businesses.

loans.use: To buy two cartons of fish to fry and sell to customers to earn more money.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more underclothes for her business.

loans.name: Most Holy Group

texts.en: Vincentia is a member of the group called Most Holy and lives in Dansoman. She is 38 years old, married, and has 2 children, both of whom are in school. She has been selling Tilapia fish for 17 years. This is her fifth loan cycle with ID-Ghana. With the Kiva loan that she receives, she will increase her capital and buy three big baskets of fresh tilapia fish to supply to her customers and earn more money. In the coming years, she would like to buy a taxi to earn more money and to see her children in school. She, together with seven others, need a total amount of GHS 6500 to increase their businesses. The colleagues are into the sale of cooking oil, wax-prints groundnut, second-hand clothing and bread.

loans.use: to buy three big baskets of fresh tilapia fish to supply to her customers and earn more money.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is 26 years old and a married woman. She lives with her husband and two children in the small village of Orulu, Zugdidi district. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have three cows, whose milk is used in cheese products, one horse, one buffalo and two pigs. She milks the cows every day and produces cheese to sell. In addition, the family owns a small agricultural plot, where they grow nuts. Nino and her husband are very hard-working persons and always have high quality products which are sold locally. 

Nino decided to start another business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 500 GEL for begin selling clothing and home products. She plans to go to the capital of Georgia and purchase the products at wholesale prices and then resell them among her friends and villagers. When she starts her business, she will increase their income and will improve living conditions for her family. Nino awaits your support.

loans.use: To start selling clothes and other home products

loans.name: Living

texts.en:
Living is a 53-year-old married man with 3 children and 5 dependents. He is a farmer who deals in cattle fattening. He also sells milk and that gives him additional income.

Living has done this business of rearing cattle and selling them for 20 years. The business has helped him take care of his different family needs.

He has requested this loan to buy more cows and expand his business and eventually enhance his income.

loans.use: To buy more cows

loans.name: Walter Albarino

texts.es: Walter de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 años de edad. Él se gana la vida como empleado de una fábrica de papel cercana a su localidad. Walter es un hombre trabajador dedicado a su familia quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para darles mejores condiciones de vida. Desea dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción del corredor de la vivienda ya que se encuentra en mal estado y no es muy seguro. Además, desea construir un cerco perimetral para asegurar su terreno y vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lámina galvanizada, madera, postes de cemento y alambre.
texts.en: Walter is 23 years old and lives with his wife and five year old son.  He earns a living working at a paper factory near his home.  Walter is a hardworking  man, dedicated to his family who does everything within his reach to provide better conditions for his family.  He wants to improve the living conditions and has decided to ask for a loan through FUSAI so he can repair the roof, since it’s not very safe.  He also wants to build a perimeter fence to secure the land and home.  He will use the money to buy galvanized metal, lumber, cement posts, and wire.

loans.use: to repair his roof.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is single and aged 24 years. He is an orphan who also takes care of his two young brothers, and they live in a rural setting. He deals in an agricultural business where he grows coffee and bananas, and keeps cattle. He also does cattle trading as a side business, which he started a few years back. 

He works seven days in a week and 12 hours per day, and started his business in order to earn living and get money to care for his young brothers since their parents died. 

He acquired this loan to purchase more cows for fattening and will later sell them at a profitable price. He said that his clients are traders from his village and those from the nearby villages.

His hope for the future is to enlarge his cattle business and be the leading supplier of cows in his village. The challenge he faces the most is too much drought, which ends up leaving the grass dry and limits water for his animals. These affect his yields and financial muscle. He is described as an honest and hardworking man, according to colleagues.

loans.use: To purchase cattle that he will fatten and later sell

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en:
Maureen is 41 years old. She lives in the Accra region, in the capital. Maureen is married and has three children of school age. She has been selling cosmetics for four years. 

Maureen has a sales point at the town market, where she sells the cosmetics. Her goods sell well, because they are what people need to look good. 

Currently, Maureen is applying for a loan amount of 1,000 GHS (Ghana cedis) to purchase more cosmetics so that she can serve her customers better. She needs this loan to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more cosmetics so that she can serve her customers better.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: El señor Felix se encuentra en la provincia de Carrasco, es de escasos recursos económicos, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos que aun dependen económicamente de él. Trabaja en la agricultura y para realizar su actividad debe utilizar  personal eventual mayormente en la siembra y cosecha de sus productos, los mismos que después debe llevar a vender hasta la feria local, actualmente solicita un crédito para un reintegro por compra de un terreno agrícola, de esta forma seguira trabajando y lograra aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Felix is from the Carrasco province. He is of low income and lives with his wife and three children, who still depend on him financially. He works in farming. To do this activity he has to use temporary workers mostly to plant and harvest his crops. He then has to take the crops to sell in the local market. Right now, he is asking for a loan to pay for buying a plot of farmland. In this way, he can keep working and be able to increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: pay for buying some a plot of farmland.

loans.name: Magaly Ana

texts.es:
Magaly vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, y se dedica a la agricultura, a Magaly le gusta mucho lo que hace sobre todo porque le gusta ver crecer el cultivo y actualmente ha sembrado yuca.
Magaly esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá brindar mantenimiento y a su cultivo y sobre todo poder comprar fertilizantes y abonos para su cultivo, de esta manear podrá tener una mejor cosecha y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia”.
texts.en:
Magaly lives in the city of Pucallpa and works as a farmer.  Magaly likes what she does because she likes to see the crops growing.  Currently she is planting yucca.  

Magaly is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to provide maintenance to her crops by purchasing fertilizer and manure.  This will allow her to have a better harvest and continue fighting to make her greatest dream a reality: to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco está muy agradecido con el apoyo que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar abono y fertilizantes para poder mejorar y dar mantenimiento a su cultivo de yuca, con lo cual podrá tener una mejor cosecha y poder mejorar sus ingresos,; de esta manera podrá seguir luchando ¿cada día para hacer realidad su sueño:” Ser un gran agricultor en su distrito”.
texts.en: Francisco is very grateful for the support that Kiva lenders are giving him.  Thanks to the support, he will be able to purchase manure and fertilizers to improve and maintain his yucca crops.  This will allow him to have a better harvest and improve his income.  He wants to continue fighting every day to make his dream of being a big farmer in his district a reality.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: La señora Concepción de 41 años de edad vive en la comunidad de Chullpani, es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos menores que están estudiando. Su actividad económica es la agricultura, percibe ingresos económicos por la venta de papa, haba y oca, cultiva en 1,5 Has. de terreno con rotación de cultivos,  los terrenos son de sus padres. Actualmente solicita un crédito para construir su vivienda y ultimar detalles ya que la construcción se quedó en obra gruesa, de esta forma podrá vivir más cómodamente junto a sus hijos.
texts.en: Concepción is 41 years old. She lives in the community of Chullpani. She is a single mother and has two minor children who are in school. Her economic activity is farming. She earns income from selling potatoes, beans and oca. She farms on 1.5 hectares of land, rotating her crops. Her parents own the land. Right now, she is asking for a loan to build her house and do the finishing, because the basic construction has been done. This way, she can live more comfortably with her children.

loans.use: to build her house.

loans.name: Koem Eang

texts.en:
Twenty-seven year old Koem Eang is married and blessed with three children. She assists her husband with managing a farming business to ensure better crop yields each harvest season. Together, they are able to earn an income of $14 (US) per day to meet their daily needs.

The family doesn’t have a safe latrine, so Koem Eang is asking for a loan to build one. A household latrine will enable her to promote good health and improve the family's living conditions. 

Thanks to the water loan program offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited at a special rate, Koem Eang has been encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine to promote good health and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es: Ella escogió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, primero porque le gusta ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan y a si darse conocer, pero también lo ve como una salida y como una meta, ya que por medio de este técnico puede estar a unos pocos pasos de ser profesional. Se debe empezar por algo y eso es aprender poco a poco a superarse. Ella necesita acceder a kiva porque ella solo cuenta con el apoyo económico de su mama ya que su papa no responde por ella. A su mama le queda muy dificl pagar la cuota normal ya que supera su economía, de esto depende que ella pueda seguir estudiando, y mas aun ya empieza a hacer sus practicas en un hospital. Todo el mundo tiene problemas económicos, pero algunas personas no tienen como pagar y a si mismo como crecer como persona. Por medio de este pequeño paso, ella quiere obtener su técnico y a si mismo, mas adelante, poder hacer una especialización en jefe de enfermería, superarse como persona y tener la satisfacción de que cumple una de sus metas propuestas, pero para eso necesitas esmero, dedicación y dinero para llevarlo a cabo, pero si ella accede a kiva va a poder lograr una escala en su gran meta propuesta. Ademas de esto, es satisfactorio saber que mas adelante, cuando su carrera de frutos ella sera una gran profesional, ubicada en un buen hospital y saliendo adelante día a día y mirando atrás todos aquellos sacrificios que tuvo que hacer, pero mirando y recordando que tuvo ayudas como lo es kiva, una ayuda económica que da motivación y superación.
texts.en:
She chose to study to be a nursing assistant because she likes to help people who need it.  She also sees it as a journey and a goal, since this technical job allows her to be a few steps from being a professional.  She needs to start with something, and she is learning slowly to get ahead.  She needs to come to Kiva because she only has financial support from her mother, since her father does not take responsibility for her.  It is difficult for her mother to pay the fees since they exceed her financial situation, but she can't continue studying if she can't pay her fees and she is starting to do her practical work in a hospital.  Everyone has financial problems, but some people don't have a way to pay, and she is growing as a person.  

This small step will help her obtain her technical degree, and later, she wants to do a specialization as a nurse manager.  She can succeed and have the satisfaction of meeting one of her goals, but in order to do that, you need care, dedication, and money.  If she comes to Kiva, she can achieve a large part of her proposed goal.  In addition, it is satisfying to know that later, when her career prospers, she will be a great professional, located in a good hospital, and moving forward day after day.  She will look back on all the sacrifices that she had to make, and she will see and remember that she had financial help from Kiva that gave her motivation and support.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, fish, meat, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to complete construction of rental houses.

loans.name: Binta

texts.fr:
Madame Binta est veuve et mère de 8 enfants dont 2 sont décédés. Elle fait du commerce depuis plus de 10 ans, elle achetait sa marchandise en Mauritanie. Elle vend des tissus et divers produits alimentaires, du savon de gommage….
Binta peut remercier le bon car elle a ses enfants qui travaillent et qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de la maison.
Le crédit peut impacter sur la situation du client en améliorant les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Si elle a les moyens, elle envisage de construire sa maison.
texts.en: Binta is a widowed mother of eight children, two of which are deceased. She has been trading for over 10 years, buying her merchandise from Mauritania. She sells fabrics and various food products, as well as cosmetics. Binta will be able to pay back the loan, as her children earn money and are able to pay for the household expenses. This loan will make a positive impact on the client's situation by improving the family's dietary conditions. If she has the means to do so, she plans to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy various food products, fabrics and cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Meb

texts.en:
Meb, aged 51, is a resident from a rural village of Santuk district, Kampong Thom province. She has five adult children. Her husband and children help her in daily farming work growing rice and water melons, which she sells at the market. She is able to earn KHR 12,000 per day, which normally goes for food and other costs of commodities.

To help her further develop her farming business, Meb is asking for a loan to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance at the rice fields. Also, this machine can be used to attach to a trailer for loading items. Meb plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy a plowing machine for the maintenance at the rice fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ladies' dresses, shoes, and bags for resale.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: El señor Teodoro es casado vive con su esposa y tiene una hija dependiente a la que mantiene y ayuda en su educación, es un persona responsable, trabaja como agricultor en su pequeña parcela, realizando mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de cítricos, ademas también trabaja como albañil cuatro días de la semana durante todo el año realizando construcciones para la población, se esfuerza cada día para mantener a su familia. Actualemente vive en su casa propia, pero la construcción no está terminada por completo, por tal motivo solicita un crédito para que pueda refaccionar su vivienda y así logre vivir más cómodo junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Teodoro is married and lives with his wife. He has one dependent daughter whom he supports and helps with her education. Teodoro is a responsible person. He works farming his plot of land, where he maintains his citrus fields. He also works in construction four days per week all year long. He works on construction projects for the town. Teodoro works very hard every day to support his family.

Teodoro lives in his own house, but the construction is not finished, which is why he is requesting this loan to work on his home, so that he and his family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to work on finishing the construction of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour by the bag, eggs by the carton, spaghetti, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Gordon

texts.en:
Gordon is a new client in the institution who has applied for a loan of 1,000,000. He is married with two children and he hails from Butinde, Rukungiri District. He does his business in Biguri trading center, Kyamakanda, Buyanja sub-county.

He wants this loan for buying merchandise for his shop. His major challenge has been lack of enough capital to expand his retail shop to a better standard. His vision is to see his retail shop expanding and his income growing to cater for other necessities in life like land, payment of his children’s school fees plus other family needs. In the photo is Gordon in his garden. He also does subsistence farming .

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his general store

loans.name: Elias

texts.en:
Elias is a very hardworking person who deals in agriculture and a boda boda (motorcycle transport) as his main sources of income. He is married and is blessed with two children who have not yet reached school-going age. 

Elias has been in the boda boda business for over three years. It is from this business that he has been able to buy different pieces of land where he has been able to expand his banana and coffee plantations.

Elias hopes to expand his banana plantation so as to harvest over 100 bunches of matooke (starchy cooking bananas) in a month. With a UGAFODE loan, Elias dreams to become a model farmer in the Kebisoni sub-county, as this will earn him more income for his family.

In the photograph is Elias in the blue jacket and the loan officer.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his banana garden

loans.name: Tengizi

texts.en:
Tengizi is a 33-year-old married man who lives in Zugdidi. He has a wife, mother and two little children. His mother gets monthly assistance of 150 GEL (Georgia lari) from the local government. The only employed person in the family is Tengizi, who is a loader to a store. However, his generated income is insignificant compared with his family's needs. 

Tengizi decided to somehow increase the living conditions of the family and wants to open a general store near his house. He requested $1,200 USD to purchase stock of food products and have money for working capital. He sought credit among local financial institutions, but his attempts were unsuccessful because of his poor living conditions. The start-up program that is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo enables rural poor and inexperienced people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. Tengizi's application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan for opening the store and increasing the productivity.

loans.use: To open a general store and have money for working capital

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is a married woman who was born in 1965. She is a mother of six. Her husband is a pastor at a small church. She decided to help her husband financially by selling maize for the past 13 years and has found it profitable. Now she wants to buy a larger quantity to raise her sales. She also wants to help her husband to take care of the six children. Because she doesn't have enough money to do so, she has applied for this loan amount of 1,000 GHS (Ghana cedis). This is her second loan with Kiva and her fourth loan with ID-Ghana.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of maize to raise her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, etc., to expand the range of sales.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 49 years old. She lives in the Accra region, in the capital. Sarah is married and has one child of school age. She has been selling eggs and onions for eight years. Sarah has a sales point that is close to her premises, where she sells the eggs and onions. Her goods sell well because they are what people need to cook good. Currently, Sarah is applying for a loan amount of 700 GHS (Ghana cedis) to purchase more eggs and onions so that she can serve her customers better. She needs this loan to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more eggs and onions so that she can serve her customers better.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more drinks, pure water and food containers to expand her business.

loans.name: Jani

texts.en:
Jani has been involved with his arboriculture (the orchard business) for the past three years, since his return from the immigration where he learned the skills for such an activity. The majority of the orchard trees are peaches; however, he is not limited and has other types as well, just in a smaller number. 

Jani is requesting a loan for the very first time to add some more peach seedlings, and the amount of 100,000 Albanian Lek will help him achieve this goal. His clients at the moment include locals; however, he wants to produce more and sell in larger quantities to wholesale buyers.

Jani is married and has two children, age 10 and 7, and all of them reside in a very rural village in south central Albania.

loans.use: to add some more peach seedlings to his orchard activity

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia, age 47, is a married woman and the mother of eight children. She has been providing laundry services with her son, who is also shown in the photo.  She makes enough through her business to bear her household expenditures. 

Over time she has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation and has attained a regular list of customers. To meet the orders of her customers, she needs to purchase a new dryer machine along with packs of washing powder. For this reason, she sought a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase a new dryer machine along with packs of washing powder.

loans.name: Tanveer

texts.en: Tanveer is a 27-year-old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida, a 59-year-old married lady, has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at  reasonable prices, and has retained many customers over the years who regularly shop at her store. She earns enough to provide for her family. 

In order to fully stock her store, Khalida has requested a loan of Rs 40,000 to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. Khalida wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a married woman. She has been successfully running a general store at her house for the last four years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough money to provide for her family. She is a mother of four children and is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing, and health. 

Shazia wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, rice, oil, pepper, etc. to expand her range of sales

loans.name: Hiba

texts.en:
Hiba is a 29-year-old mother of three children who has been running her convenience store for a year. She is a hard worker who is putting much effort into supporting her husband and beloved family.

Hiba is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy a bedroom for her children.

She is well known in her region with the special prices and quality of products she provides to her customers.

She will continue to work hard to develop her business. In the future she will open a special fruits and vegetables section to fulfill her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy a bedroom for her children.

loans.name: Celerina

texts.en:
Celerina is a woman from Cabawan District, Tagbilaran City. She is married with eight children. Her eldest is 24 years old, and her youngest is three. Celerina works hard raising hogs for an income and also cooking dishes to sell. She perseveres because she needs to support her children. 

She is asking for a loan to buy vegetables, meat, seasoning, and feed for her hogs. With this loan, she is optimistic that her business will prosper and bring a good profit for her family. Her income will be for her family's daily consumption and school fees. In the future, she hope to expand her business and improve her menu to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, seasoning, and feed for her hogs

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 19 años, 16 años y 15 años de edad. María se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras. La venta la realiza en el mercado central de su localidad y tienen 5 años de experiencia en el negocio. Desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda y construir un corredor por lo que se vio en la necesidad de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios (lámina galvanizada, madera, ladrillo, cemento y arena)para reparar el techo y para construir el corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en: María, 43, is a single mother and lives in a house of her own with her three children, aged 19, 16, and 15. She sells fruits and vegetables at her town's central market and has been doing so for the last five years.
