With this investment, she hopes that her quality of life will improve as she will be able to increase her production.

Lucia is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and the opportunity afforded to her and her family.

loans.use: to physically expand her business and production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and a weighing scale

loans.name: Ligia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora. Ligia es una socia que participa activamente en su grupo de crédito Mujeres Floreciendo, siendo este su sexto crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y espera mantener la misma amistad con todas ellas. Vive por la comunidad de Paccha en Cuenca, lugar que goza de un clima frió, de exuberante vegetación y de verdes campos, tiene una arquitectura que es mezcla de lo antiguo y lo moderno, su gente es amable gentil, siendo su principal actividad la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
La Señora Ligia tiene 46 años de edad, está divorciada, en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos, dos de ellos son casados y viven independientes, sus hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su ultima hija de 8 años está estudiando en una escuelita del sector, la casa en la que vive es  propia.
Doña Ligia se dedica a la agricultura, siembra hortalizas y su cosecha la vende en la ciudad, también se dedica a la cría de cerdos, cuyes, pollos y ganado. 
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cuyes y alimento para animales. Su meta es mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Ligia is a member who participates actively in the communal bank "Mujeres Floreciendo" ["Women Flourishing"]. This is her sixth loan, which she is taking out together with her friends, and she hopes to maintain the same friendship with all of them. She lives in the community of Paccha in Cuenca, a place which enjoys a cool climate, with exuberant vegetation and green fields. Its architecture is a mixture of antique and modern, and its people are polite and friendly, with their main activities being agriculture, animal raising and commerce. 

Ligia is 46 years old and divorced. From her marriage she has 6 children, two of whom are married and living independently. Her children who are single are working, and they help her economically. Her youngest daughter is 8 years old, and she attends a small school in the area. The house she lives in is her own. 

Ligia works in agriculture, growing vegetables. She sells her harvest in the city. She also works raising pigs, guinea pigs, chickens and cattle. 

She will invest the funds from her loan in buying chickens, guinea pigs and animal feed. Her goal is to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy chickens, guinea pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Joey

texts.en: Joey is a very responsible father and husband who has committed himself to his farming business. He is 42 years old, and he has devoted more than 28 years of his time to his farmland. Over the years of working for this muddy source of income, he has learned the hardships of earning funds for his family and his business. At this moment, he is in a problematic situation due to an insufficiency of capital. So, he is seeking a loan of PHP 10,000, which he will use to buy the necessities needed for his farming business such as seeds, fertilizer and pesticides. He is hoping that through these farm inputs, he can grow his proceeds and lift his family's unprivileged lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs

loans.name: Ekhlas

texts.en:
Ekhlas was born in 1993. She is married and lives in a sector of Jordan called Dair Alla, with her husband who is in the military. 

Ekhlas has been financially supporting her husband by running her business of selling clothes for the past year. She started the business with a small quantity of them. 

Now, she needs to expand her business by purchasing a larger quantity of clothes and blankets, in order to raise her profit. But, she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita owns and operates a small variety store. She is 57 years of age and is full of hopes in life. She dreams of becoming successful and financially stable someday. To make her dreams attainable, she is doing her best to increase her income.

Clarita is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase additional stocks of soap, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, snack foods, beverages, and fish paste to sell. 

She is hoping that someday she will improve her business using her loan, together with hard work and patience.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of soap, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, snack foods, beverages and fish paste to sell.

loans.name: Jovito

texts.en:
Jovito is a 64-year-old farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. He is a married with ten grown children. He has been farming for a long time now. 

He is asking for a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fertilizer for his farm. Fertilizer has contributed to him having a productive farm in the past. Jovito hopes to make his business successful and sustainable. He also dreams of having enough savings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Kefah

texts.en:
Kefah is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Kefah was born in 1969. She is married and a mother of seven living in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa. 

One of Kefah's sons is working in the Jordanian Geographic center in Jordan and at the same time studying for his Bachelors’. He is one step closer to graduation and is planning to find a better job after graduation to start helping his family financially. Because Kefah and her husband don’t have enough money to pay for their son's upcoming study fees, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys vive con su familia en la ciudad de Itá, su familia tiene 5 integrantes. Ella comenta que trabaja en forma dependiente, y que su sueño es poder terminar su carrera para ser una persona independiente, que trabaje en su profesión.
Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería comercial, con lo que quiere destacarse y poder salir adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de clases, como ser copias y materiales de estudio. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Gladys lives with her family of 5 in the city of Itá.  She states that she works as an employee, but her dream is to be able to finish her education so she can have her own business in her profession.  She is studying business administration, which she wants to stand out in and be able to get ahead.  

She is asking for this loan so she can use it to cover the costs of her courses such as: making copies and study materials.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: pay for school costs such as: copies and materials.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene es de la ciudad de Villarrica, ella al igual que muchos jóvenes está sacrificándose por salir adelante y poder superarse.
Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, con lo que quiere ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es la salud. Ella comenta que su familia es quien la inspira a seguir luchando para crecer.
Ella pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y así seguir luchando por su sueño.
texts.en:
Marlene is from the city of Villarrica.  Like many young people, she is making sacrifices in order to get ahead and overcome.  She is studying nursing, which she wants to use to help other people with their health which is very important.  She says that her family inspirers her to continue striving to grow.

She is asking for this loan to use it to pay her fees so she can continue studying and striving towards her dream.

loans.use: pay for university fees.

loans.name: Aydin

texts.en:
Aydin is 55 years old, married and has two children. One of them is his 29-year-old son who is married. Another child is 24 years old, she is engaged and wants to get married this year. Aydin’s family are IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons) from Kalbadjar city and now live in Abseron region. 

Aydin has a cafe. In it, Aydin serves customers national dishes as “Bozbash”, “Kufte”, “Xash” and etc. Today Aydin needs a loan of an amount of 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy a new fridge. Previously he took two loans from Kiva and successfully paid them off. He is thankful to the Kiva organization and the lenders for their help. In the future Aydin wants to increase area of his cafe and his monthly income.

loans.use: to buy a new fridge.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria empezó su carrera hace un año, con el propósito de ser una profesional útil a la sociedad por medio de su carrera.
Ella está estudiando para ser ingeniera ambiental, ya que quiere poder ayudar al medio ambiente que es algo tan importante para la vida del planeta.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas de universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y luchando por salir adelante y cumplir con la meta que se propuso.
texts.en:
Maria began her degree a year ago with the aim of being a professional, who through her degree is useful to society. 

She is studying to be an environmental engineer because she wants to be able to help the environment, which is so important to the life of the planet.

She is applying for this loan to invest in her university tuition fees, and in this way she'll be able to keep studying and fighting to get ahead and fulfil the goal she has set.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia proviene de una familia humilde, luchadora y sacrificada. Su meta es llegar a recibirse con el título de licenciada en criminalística para así poder especializarse más en la carrera que está estudiando y así poder ayudar a sus padres.
Pide de este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, ya que le será de mucha ayuda para poder cumplir con su meta. Agradece ya que con esta ayuda podrá ir mejorando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sonia comes from a modest, selfless family with a fighting spirit. 

Her goal is to successfully become qualified in criminology so that she is able to further specialise in her area of study and therefore be able to help her parents. 

She is applying for this loan to pay her university tuition fees, which will help her a lot in achieving her goal. She is grateful that with this help she'll be able to continue improving as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more blankets to sell.

loans.name: Faris

texts.en:
Faris was born in 1994. He is single and lives in a sector of Jordan called Karak with his four siblings and his parents. His father is a retired man. Faris has been trying his best to support his family financially by running his project of selling clothes, perfumes and accessories for five years. 

He stared his project selling a small quantity of them. Now he would like expand his project by purchasing a larger quantity of clothes and perfumes in order to raise his profit. Btu he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and perfumes for his business.

loans.name: Cruz Margarita

texts.es:
EL banco comunal 20 De Abril se reúne cada 15 días en el Cantón Montecristi conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Cruz, tiene 58 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció pero de esta relación tienen 8 hijos  mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun vive en su casa. 
Doña Cruz es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta ganar lo suyo sin tener que depender de sus hijos que son los que más aportan en su casa, ella se dedica a  la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local. Trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene tres años con esta actividad que le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está desde el inicio en el banco comunal y le gusta porque así ella financia su negocio. Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en: The Crédito 20 de Abril group meets every fortnight in Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its nationally and internationally renowned handicrafts. It is the home of the famous straw hats. It is here that group member Cruz lives. She is 58 years of age and lost her beloved husband a number of years ago.  However, she has 8 grown-up children from her marriage, three of whom still live at home.  Cruz is a very hardworking woman who likes to earn her own living and not have to depend on her children who make the biggest contribution to the household.  She sells clothing of all types, selling them door to door and also from her home, where she has a small shop.  She works every day, leaving goods with her customers on credit and making collections every fortnight.  She has been running the business for 3 years and it enables her to get by.  She plans to use the loan to buy more merchandise such as: trousers, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothes.  She has been a member of the credit group since its inception and likes it because it enables her to finance her business.  Her dream is to remain healthy.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Mata De Palma En Desarrollo 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Carmen is the coordinator of the group Mata de Palma en Desarrollo 2 & 3 ("Mata de Palma in development," called this because this is the name of the community). The group is is located in Hato Mayor city, in the eastern part of the country. Hato Mayor is a fairly mountainous region where the principal industry is agriculture. 

Carmen is a mother of four children, and they live together with her and their father. She said that her most difficult challenge was to create her business. In the past it was very difficult for her because she didn't have or know how to save capital to start, but after she found Esperanza and took out her loans, she was able (like other members in this group) to open her business. 

Carmen is excited about her 17th loan with Esperanza. After almost nine years in her business, she has expanded her little butcher shop into a bigger one, with more quantity of meats to supply more clients. With this loan she will buy beef and pork to sell in her business. She will use the profits to invest in her butcher shop, and she will continuing saving part of it to make one of her dreams come true: to start building her house. She dreams of having a nice house and a successful business with employees. 

Carmen and her group thank all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy meat (beef, chicken, pork)

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 44 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con su esposa y sus hijos de 18 16 y 13 años en el Cantón  Ventanas Provincia Los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de arroz y maíz. Solicita el crédito para la siembra de arroz, maíz y para la compra que es necesaria en la agricultura como la semilla y el abono. 
Las compras lo realizan en la ciudad de Ventanas. El sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida y comprarse un terreno. Los desafíos que se enfrenta es presencia de mucha lluvia. En el tiempo libre le gusta viajar y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos is 44 years old and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his spouse and their children, who are 18, 16, and 13 years old, in the canton of Ventanas, province of Los Ríos.

Carlos is a member of the communal bank Palmasola, which is located in the rural settlement of Palmasola, in the parish of Ricaurte, canton of Urdaneta. The members work in agriculture and raising livestock.

Carlos works in agriculture, growing rice and corn. He is requesting this loan in order to plant rice and corn, and to purchase necessary items for agriculture, like seeds and manure. He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas. 

Carlos's dreams are to improve his living conditions and buy himself a piece of land. The challenge he faces is the presence of heavy rain. In his free time, he likes to travel and play sports.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to grow rice.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia comenta que su papá es un comerciante, y que por medio de su trabajo la ha ayudado en sus estudios.
Claudia está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería informática, y quiere ser una profesional que pueda ayudar a las personas y ser útil a la sociedad. Su sueño es poder desarrollarse, no solo como profesional, sino también  como persona.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y también para cubrir sus gastos de transporte. Ella está contenta por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Claudia comments that her father is a merchant and by means of his work, he has helped her with her studies.

Claudia is studying information engineering and she wishes to be a professional who can help people and be useful to society. Her dream is to develop herself, not just as a professional but, also, as a person.

She requests this loan to invest in payment of her university fees and, also, to cover the costs of transportation. Claudia is happy for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay her university fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Damian

texts.es:
Damian es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Informática, también trabaja en una empresa privada como auditor de campo, vive y estudia por la Ciudad de Santaní. Es muy dedicado al estudio, una persona que desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus metas. Su meta es de tener su título Universitario, poder trabajar de forma independiente y también poder enseñar en las Universidades para poder ayudar a las personas que al igual que el quieren aprender.
Damian pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir esos gastos en que incurrirán.
texts.en:
Damian is studying for a computer engineering degree, and he also works in a private company as a field auditor. He lives and studies in the city of Santaní.

He's very dedicated to his studies, a person who wants to get ahead through his efforts to reach his goals. His goal is to have a university qualification, to be able to work independently and also to be able to teach in universities to help other people who want to study like him.

Damian is applying for this loan to pay his tuition fees, because in this way he'll be able to cover the costs he'll incur.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Nueva Ilusión Group

texts.es: El grupo “Nueva Ilusión” se encuentra en una comunidad muy tranquila, sus habitantes aún tienen sus costumbres y tradiciones muy arraigadas. La fiesta más celebrada es el 14 de agosto, día que celebran a la Virgen de San Juan. El grupo está conformado por cuatro mujeres muy trabajadoras y responsables, platican que el nombre del grupo lo eligió su Oficial de Crédito, pero a todas les agradó ya que significa mucho, pues la oportunidad de un crédito es como tener una nueva ilusión en sus negocios y en sus familias. Juana o Doña Juanita, como le llaman de cariño, tiene 50 años de edad, estudio la primaria, está casada con el señor Leobardo desde hace 28 años y juntos formaron una familia con 5 hijos de los cuales dos de ellos aun se encuentran estudiando. Doña Juanita tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, se dedica a la cría y engorda de borregos y también elabora bordados. Comenzó con la actividad de los borregos y los bordados, pero en tiempos de lluvia notó que sus animalitos enflacaban mucho y era difícil ponerlos en venta. Hace dos años decidió iniciar con su pequeña tienda de abarrotes porque cuando ella necesitaba comprar algún producto tenía que caminar  varios kilómetros para poder llegar a la tienda, por eso mismo decidió iniciar a vender algunos productos los más esenciales como leche, pan, huevo, alimentos enlatados, refrescos etc. “Mi suegra tenía una pequeña tiendita pero termino cerrándola y de allí aprendí un poco”. Esta vez está solicitando crédito para comprar mas borreguitos chicos, tela cuadrille, estambre de varios colores, hilos agujas, etc. Por el momento no invertirá en su tiendita de abarrotes pues sus hijos mayores son quienes la apoyan para comprar más productos. En cuanto a la creación de bordados, Juanita cuenta con 20 años de experiencia: “Desde muy pequeña me llamo la atención la artesanía y aprendí solo viendo”. sin embargo, ella tiene la vista ya muy cansada y ahora debe utilizar lentes para elaborar sus servilletas. Platica también que a sus tres actividades les tiene mucho cariño, en la tiendita solo hay clientela en la tarde y en la mañana, durante el día la mantiene abierta pero aprovecha para bordar y todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano para darles de comer. En general, Doña Juanita no tiene ningún problema con sus negocios y el único sueño que tiene es lograr mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos que aún están estudiando. Las integrantes del grupo están muy agradecidas con KIVA y VisionFund por el crédito otorgado porque podrán invertir en sus negocios. Francisca invertirá en abarrotes, Maximina y Yaneth invertirán en bordados.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ilusión” group is from a very tranquil community and its people maintain their well-rooted customs and traditions.  The most celebrated festival is on August 14, the day that the Virgin (Mary) of San Juan is celebrated.  The group is made up of four hardworking and responsible ladies who say that the group’s name was selected by the loan official, but they all liked it because it means many things, and the chance having another loan is a new dream for their businesses and families.  Juana, or Juanita as her friend’s call her, is 50 years old.  She has an elementary school education, has been married to Leobardo for 28 years, and together they formed a family that includes five children. Two of whom attend school.

Juanita has a small grocery store, raises sheep, and also embroiders.  She started out raising sheep and embroidering, but during the rainy season she noticed that the animals would get too thin and it was difficult to sell them.  Two years ago she decided to open a small grocery store because whenever she needed to buy a product, she had to walk for several kilometers to get to a store, so she decide to begin selling the most essential products such as milk, bread, eggs, canned goods, soft drinks, etc.  “My mother-in-law had a small store but ended up closing it, but I learned some things there.”

This time she is asking for a loan to buy more lambs, fabric, checkered cloth, yarn in various colors, thread, needles, etc.  She will not invest into her grocery store at the moment because her oldest children will help her to buy products.  Juanita has 20 years’ experience making weaves.  “I have liked the arts since I was very little and I learned just by watching.”  However, her vision is tired and now she needs gasses to make her napkins.  She also says that she loves her three activities.  She only gets customers in her store in the evenings, but keeps it open during the day and uses the time to weave and gets up very early every morning to make breakfast.

Generally Juanita doesn’t have any problems with her income and her only dream is to improve her quality of life for her children who are in school.  The members of the group are very grateful to Kiva and Vision Fund for the loan because they will be able to invest in their businesses.  Francisca will invest in groceries, Maximina and Yaneth will invest in embroidery.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

location.town: La Virgen del Centro, San Felipe del Progreso

loans.name: Las Ranitas (Flat) Group

texts.es:
Angelica es una mujer emprendedora que por más de 8 años ha trabajado en la cría de cerdos y venta de cosméticos. Ella platica que decidió iniciar a trabajar en su propio negocio porque quería ayudar a su esposo a pagar los gastos de su hogar así que inicio comprando unos cerdos para ir criándolos y ganarse un poco de dinero, desde entonces se dedica esta actividad. Angelica dice que tiene que dedicar su tiempo a alimentar y mantener limpios los chiqueros pero vale la pena ya que cuando los vende le deja una buena ganancia, ella además en su tiempo libre sale a vender cosméticos por catálogo para obtener un ingreso extra. Un crédito de Kiva y de VisionFund le ayudará a comprar alimentos y cosméticos. Ella espera que con esta inversión su negocio prospere y pueda ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son: Teresa venta de productos naturistas, Alejandrina venta de comida, Verónica venta de miel y cosméticos y Agustina venta de antojitos.
texts.en:
Angelica is an enterprising woman that has worked for over 8 years breeding pigs and selling cosmetics. She says she decided to start working in her own business because she wanted to help her husband with the household expenditures, so she started earning some money by acquiring and breeding pigs. Since then she has been dedicated to this activity. 

Angelica says she has to spend her time feeding the pigs and keeping the pens clean, but all of this is completely worth it when she gets to obtain a good amount of money for her sales. In her free time she also sales cosmetics from a catalog line to have an extra income. A loan from Kiva and VisionFund will help her to buy pig feed and cosmetics. She hopes that with this investment her business will be prosper and she will be able to give her family a better quality of life. 

Other members of the group are: Teresa, who sells natural products; Alejandrina, who sells food; Verónica, who sells honey and cosmetics; and Agustina, who sells traditional corn-based Mexican dishes.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and cosmetics.

loans.name: Miryan

texts.es:
Miryan está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, ya que su meta anhelada siempre fue poder ayudar a las demás personas. Ella se define a sí misma como una persona que quiere salir adelante, y es por eso que se está esforzando al máximo.
Miryan está dando su mayor esfuerzo para poder cumplir con su meta. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, lo que le permitirá seguir con sus estudios, y de esa forma poder cumplir su anhelo de ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Miryan is studying a degree in Law, as her long-time goal has always been to be able to help others. 

She defines herself as a person who wants to get ahead, and it's because of this that she is putting everything into it. Miryan is giving her all to achieve her goal. 

She is applying for this loan to invest in paying university tuition fees, which will mean she can carry on studying, and in this way fulfil her desire of being a great professional.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila started her business because it afforded her the opportunity to make better money than working for another company. Word quickly spread about her quality service and availability and suddenly Sheila was handling more clients than ever before.  She brought on three family members and four other employees to help her handle the contracts. 

Sheila is ready to take her business to the next step again. She has the opportunity to further expand the business, but she needs the money to purchase additional cleaning equipment so that she can fill more contracts. Help this Brazilian-American achieve her loan goal and build her family business!

loans.use: to purchase additional cleaning supplies

loans.name: Raymond

texts.en:
After suffering a serious injury that required immediate assistance, Raymond realized that the traditional first aid kit is lacking technology that allows people to easily and efficiently analyze an injury, alert the appropriate facilities, and handle the injury to the best of their abilities until the paramedics arrive. 

Raymond then established CuraKit, where he will develop a product he calls “Mobile external Diagnositic integrand Kit” (MeDiK). He envisions that MeDiK will be a mobile electronic device that can be used as a first aid response. It essentially combines several first-responder resources into one device. The compact device will be used to record and provide information at the scene of an emergency. It will be able to take blood samples, provide oxygen, locate nearby emergency personnel, and will contain medical supplies like gauze.

“I wish to use my quantitative strengths to design products that meet the needs of the sporting industry and families.”

It goes without saying that Raymond, who moved from Ghana to the United States ten years ago, is really smart! His Masters in Molecular Biology and his experience as a medical lab analyst and technologist make him equipped to handle the complexities of how such an important device can better aid people in case of an injury.

With your contribution towards his loan goal, Raymond will be able to go into the research and product development phase, which entails product conceptualization, electronics research, and the purchase of materials necessary to create a mock-up for the electronic system needed for the device to operate. 

Help this innovative entrepreneur begin building this product that has the potential to save lives.

loans.use: to create a mock-up for the electronic system needed for his product to operate.

loans.name: Kimberly

texts.en:
Kimberly has been a beautician for more than ten years, and it was during this decade of being the go-to stylist for women who wanted to look their best, that Kimberly discovered what it was that made her feel fulfilled and gave her purpose. “I love inspiring women and helping them feel and look their best.”

In an effort to bring her talent for hairstyling and her knowledge of the hair industry to a larger audience, Kimberly established Divine Textures, an online hair extension store. On the site, Kimberly will offer her clients the highest quality, unprocessed hair extensions.

Unfortunately, a lack of funds has halted the launch of Kimberly’s two-month-old business, and that’s why she needs your help. With a contribution to her loan goal, you will not only help Kimberly develop her website but also help her pay for online marketing and advertising efforts like Search Engine Optimization and Pay-Per-Click campaigns.

Launching the website is only the first step towards a big future Kimberly envisions for Divine Textures. She hopes to eventually open a Divine Textures storefront and would like to one day found a non-profit organization that provides cancer patients with wigs.

Help this motivated and generous entrepreneur by donating to her loan goal today.

loans.use: to develop a website for her business and pay for online advertising.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy inventory and clothing to build his business.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
María Margarita es una clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.

María Margarita tiene 63 años, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio desde hace 40 años. María Margarita comenta que ha tenido diferentes trabajos, inició vendiendo antojitos mexicanos, después tuvo una tienda de abarrotes,  luego vendió pescados y actualmente se dedica a rentar mesas, sillas y lonas para eventos. Ella esta solicitando el préstamo para realizar mejoras en su vivienda, quiere arreglar los acabados, para estar más cómoda y que su casa se vea más bonita. María Margarita es una persona responsable y organizada, siempre ha pagado sus créditos puntualmente y ha sabido ahorrar e ir formando un patrimonio. Ella dice que sus principales logros han sido sacar a sus hijos adelante y construir su casa.
texts.en:
María Margarita is a client of Kubo Financiero, and this is her story.

María Margarita, age 63, is a widow and has three children.  She has been in commerce for 40 years. María Margarita says that she has had different jobs.  She started selling Mexican snacks.  After that, she had a grocery store.  Then, she sold fish.  She now rents out tables, chairs, and tarps for events.

She is requesting the loan to make improvements to her home.  She wants to work on the finishes in order to be more comfortable and so that her house will look prettier.

María Margarita is a responsible and organized person.  She has always repaid her loans punctually.  She has known how to save and to build a legacy.  She says that her main achievements have been getting her children ahead and building her house.

loans.use: to make repairs and improvements to her house.

loans.name: Ray

texts.en:
Ray is the community handyman for the Fort Worth, Texas area. With more than 30 years of experience in home restoration, he is available to serve any client. Ray is experienced in installing floors and repairing or remodeling homes, with an emphasis on remodeling kitchens, and has worked in more than seven cities, including his hometown of Crowley, Texas.

Currently, Ray provides jobs for three people in his community. But when his business expenses exceeded what he had, Ray ventured to Accion Texas Inc. for a business loan. Once he was approved, he updated some of his tools, paid for maintenance on his work truck, and was able to go back to work and pay his employees. 

Ray prides himself on being affordable while offering great service, but also says without the loan, he would have possibly had to lay off some of his three employees. Saved by his Accion loan, Ray is able to continue offering his skills and talent to commercial and residential clients.

loans.use: to repair his work truck, update his tools and pay his employees.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Mujeres Luchadoras está formado por 7 mujeres quienes hacen honor a su nombre ya que se esfuerzan, sacrifican y luchan día a día para brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos y sus familias, son personas que mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedica a laborar en la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio. Viven por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de hermosos paisajes, una arquitectura colonial que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Delfa, se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y compañera del grupo de crédito Mujeres Luchadoras, le gusta su grupo ya que todas son personas amables y siempre se apoyan en sus momentos buenos y malos.
La Señora Delfa tiene 42 años de edad, es viuda y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 21, 16 y 11 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, sus dos últimos hijos estudian en el colegio, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Delfa desde muy joven se ha dedicado al comercio, vende una gran variedad de ropa, este negocio le ha permitido ayudar en su hogar y ahora es el único sustento para todos los gastos de su hogar. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de ropa y así ampliar más su negocio. Su meta es tener un almacén para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The lending group Mujeres Luchadoras is comprised of 7 women who honor their name as they strive, sacrifice and struggle everyday to provide their children and families with a better future.  They are people who maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.  They work in agriculture, animal husbandry and business.  They live near the city of Cuenca, a city with beautiful landscapes and colonial architecture for which it was given the name of "Cultural Heritage of Humanity" in December of 1999.  

One of the members of this group is Delfa, who is in her third loan with her friends and partners in the Mujeres Luchadoras lending group.  She likes her group because they are all kind people who continually support each other through good and bad.  Delfa is 42 years, is widowed, and in her marriage, conceived 3 children ages 21, 16 and 11.  Her first son is married and lives on his own.  Her last two children are in school.  She does not own her home, so she lives in a leased home. 

From a young age, Delfa has worked in business.  She sells a great variety of clothing, a business that has allowed her to help with her home, and is not the only income for all of the household expenses.  She will use this loan to purchase clothing to expand her business.  Her goal is to have a store to sell her products from.

loans.use: purchase clothing.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en: Peru's Arturo is an artisan who specializes in making leather handbags. He would like to invest in the purchase of leather to increase production. Arturo has been selling through NOVICA since 2003. This is his story: "I have specialized in tooled leather since 1995. My parents are in the clothing industry, where I learned many of the techniques I apply to leather. I am the father of two children, and I get many design ideas from my wife, Veronica. I prefer desk accessories, handbags, briefcases and luggage. We use hand tools, and I've formed a community of artisans who collaborate with me. Our designs are lovingly crafted by hand, and we feel a personal attachment to what we do." "I'd like to thank you all for collaborating with this microcredit. By being able to purchase leather in larger quantities I'll be able to increase my stock, especially with the new designs I have in mind." Use the link below to view Arturo's leather bags on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/3957

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of leather to increase production.

loans.name: Niveen

texts.en:
Niveen, who was born in 1986, is married and lives in a sector of Jordan called Wihdat with her husband, who is a trader. Niveen has been supporting her husband financially by running her business selling clothes and blankets for the past two years. 

Niveen started with a small quantity of merchandise, but now wants to expand by purchasing a larger quantity of clothes and blankets in order to raise her profit. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and blankets to sell

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 20 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Teresa es una joven visionaria quien con mucho esfuerzo ha empezado a estudiar en la Universidad  y al mismo tiempo trabaja en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Desea terminar sus estudios y así poder ayudar a su familia a mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Actualmente desea ayudar a su familia en las mejoras de la vivienda ya que el techo del corredor se encuentra deteriorado. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y polines para reparar el techo lo antes posible. Tiene plena confianza que con lo que gana en su trabajo logrará pagar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Teresa is 20 years old, single, and lives in her own home with her family. She is a visionary young woman who started her studies at the university with great effort. At the same time, she works for a company that is near her town.

Teresa wants to finish her studies so that she can help her family and improve their living conditions. At the moment, she wants to help improve her family's living condition by repairing the roof above a hallway that has deteriorated. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of galvanized sheets, wood, and boards for repairing the roof as soon as possible.

Teresa is fully confident that the earnings from her job will enable her to repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, and boards for repairing the roof of her home.

loans.name: Carlos Efrain

texts.es:
Carlos, es soltero vive junto a su familia, por la necesidad de tener más ingresos con los cuales poder apoyar a su familia y cubrir sus gastos personales, instalo un ciber, el cual atiende de 8:00 a.m.  hasta las 4:00 p.m.
Con el capital comprara dos computadoras completas (monitor, cpu, ups, teclado y ratón), con lo que fortalecerá el negocio para dar mejor comodidad y actualizar la tecnología de su establecimiento, espera obtener mayor afluencia de personas y con ello mejores ingresos.
Sueña con tener un negocio mejor equipado y más rentable, para continuar ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is single and lives with his family. Due to the need to earn higher profits in order to support his family and pay for his personal expenses, he set up an internet cafe. There he provides services from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m.
With the loan he'll purchase two fully equipped computers (monitor, CPU, UPS, keyboard and mouse). With them he'll strengthen his business so he can provide more convenience and upgrade the technology in his cafe. He hopes to obtain a greater influx of people and thus better profits.
He dreams of owning a business that is better equipped and more profitable so that he can continue to support his family.

loans.use: to purchase two computers.

loans.name: Majda

texts.en:
Majda was born in 1980. She is married and lives in a sector in Jordan called Dairalla with her two daughters and her husband who works in agriculture. 

Majda has been helping her husband in agriculture and supporting him financially by running her project of selling clothes and accessories for one year. She started it with a small quantity. Now she needs to expand her project by purchasing a larger quantity of clothes and accessories in order to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and accessories to sell

loans.name: Angel Alipio

texts.es:
Ángel tiene 51 años de edad, es casado, tiene un   hijo, vive con su esposa en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 
Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Ángel se dedica a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Solicita el préstamo para  poder comprar los fertilizantes y para arrendar el terreno para sembrar.  Las compras lo realiza en el cantón ventanas. 

Su sueño es mejorar su cultivo y la producción para tener una mejor calidad de  vida. El desafío  que enfrenta es combatir contra las malezas.  En su tiempo libre le gusta caminar con su familia y ser responsable en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Ángel is 51 years old. He's married and has a son. He lives with his wife in the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Ríos.
He's a member of the Palmasola communal bank, which is located in the Palmasola precinct belonging to the Ricaurte parish, Urdaneta canton. The members do agricultural work and raise livestock.

Ángel grows corn and rice. He requests the loan in order to purchase fertilizers and rent the plot of land for sowing. He makes his purchases in the Ventanas canton.

His dream is to improve his crop and his production so that he can improve his living conditions. The challenge he faces is fighting weeds. He likes to spend his free time going for walks with his family and being responsible in his work.

loans.use: to purchase supplies (fertilizer).

loans.name: Fredelie

texts.en:
Fredelie is a 52-year-old mother who is engaged in the hog-raising business. Despite being widowed, she still had  the determination to improve her status of living. 

She plans to buy a stock of hog feed, vitamins, and additional pigs to raise but her capital is not sufficient. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000. 

Fredelie hopes to obtain this amount of loan to improve and strengthen her business in order to generate sufficient income. She hopes that her loan request will be granted for her to be able to improve the business she manages.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional pigs to raise

loans.name: Ahsan

texts.en:
Ahsan is from Iraq. He is 35 years old, single, and lives with his parents and his brother. Ahsan is the sole provider of the family.  Ahsan is a grocer. He owns a small grocery store in his neighborhood where he sells snacks, canned food, drinks and ice cream. He has been providing his family’s income through this grocery store since 2012. Ahsan has gained good experience in this field. He has hired an employee and is well known in the neighborhood. 

Ahsan is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his grocery store and to increase his selling goods. Ahsan believes that by renovating his grocery store, he will be able to attract more customers, and thus increase his profits. By increasing his profits, Ahsan will be able to provide his family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store and to increase his selling goods.

loans.name: Shaker

texts.en:
Shaker was born in 1984. He is married and has one son and one daughter, and  lives in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa. His father is a retired man who owns a handicapped center. Shaker has been running his project of repairing washing machines and refrigerators for five years. He gained his experience from working previously in a repairing store; then he opened his own project. 

Now he needs to buy the needed tools and replacement parts in order to be more productive and to raise his profit. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy replacement parts for his business

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es: Rosa de 41 años de edad se dedica a la venta de mondongo (carne de vaca) desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil y le ayuda en los gastos de la casa, Rosa esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mondongo por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa, 41, has made her living selling tripe (beef) for several years. Her business is located in her place of residence, with the earnings she achieves for her sales used to cover household expenses. She lives in her own home with her husband who works as a mason and helps with the expenses of the household. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy wholesale tripe to continue her work because it is her only source of income and so she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale tripe (beef)

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is an Iraqi youth client who is 21 years old, single, and lives with his family of four members, of whom one is employed, and they share the family income together. Abdullah owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2013. He has built up good experience in this field and is becoming well-known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation. 

Abdullah is requesting a sum of $2,400 as a youth loan in order to renovate his grocery store by repainting its walls from inside and outside, as well as to increase his selling inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store by repainting its walls from inside and outside, as well as to increase his selling inventory

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es:
Ana, necesita capital para invertir en la compra de aceite, quesillo, chicharron, tomates, yuca, papas y aderezos, con lo que su inventario será surtido, ya que el año escolar ofrece sus productos por el momento en su casa. 
Con el crédito anterior ella compro la materia prima que necesitaba para su negocio, ella aumento sus clientes y por tanto las ganancias que recibe son mejores, su familia se mantiene saludable y con el mismo número de miembros.
texts.en:
Ana needs a loan to invest it in the purchase of oil, curd, fried pork skin, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes and dressings, so that she will supply her inventory; at the moment she sells her products from her house during the school year.
She used her previous loan to buy basic necessities she needed for her shop; the number of her customer has increased and she consequently earns a better income. Her family still enjoys good health and it is composed of the same number of people.

loans.use: To buy oil, curd, fried pork skin, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes and dressings.

loans.name: Sinore

texts.en:
Sinore is 35 years old, married to Oloishorua, and blessed with five children that she supports. She is a maize farmer in Narok county, Kenya, and has been in the farming activity for the past ten years with a monthly income of KES 14,000. 

She has been advanced a fourth loan from vision Fund Kenya of KES 40,000 that she intends to use to purchase farm inputs (e.g., manure, seedlings, and preparation of the land for the next planting season).

She intends to use anticipated profits to reinvest.  Her dream is to be successful in her venture

loans.use: purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Alovaddin

texts.ru: Аловаддин позитивный и ответственный мужчина. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке.  Но дом, в котором они живут, пришёл в нехорошее состояние и нуждается в ремонте. Сам Аловаддин работает мастером по ремонту домов и квартир. Он давно уже хочет отремонтировать свой дом, но у него не хватает денежных средств.  Жена Аловаддина домохозяйка,она нигде не работает и полностью находится на обеспечении своего мужа. Но она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама.  Доход, который получает от своей работы Аловаддин, хватает всего лишь на проживание. Поэтому Аловаддин  обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Аловаддин очень  надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку, которая поможет ему обеспечить достойные условия для проживания своей семье.
texts.en: Alovaddin is a positive and responsible man. He is married and has three children. He lives with his family in a small village. The house in which they live is in bad condition and needs repair. Alovaddin works renovating houses and apartments. He had long wanted to renovate his house, but he doesn't have the money. Alovaddin's wife is a housewife. She has no job and is entirely dependent on her husband. However, she is a very hardworking and caring mother. Alovaddin's salary is just enough to live off of. Therefore Alovaddin approached Arvand for a loan to purchase construction materials to repair his home. Alovaddin is hoping for a positive result, and he thanks Arvand in advance for its support, which will help him provide decent living conditions for his family.

loans.use: buy building materials

loans.name: Nedaa

texts.en:
Neda is a 21-year-old lady who lives in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq with her four brothers and her parents. Her father is retired. 

Neda is studying for a bachelor's degree, majoring in Sport Training and Management. She is in her fourth year and is one step closer to graduation. 

She is planning to work in her study field after that to start helping her family financially as they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Yohanmi

texts.es:
Yohanmi es una Joven Estudiante de Medicina, ella solicita un préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Hola mi nombre es Yohanmi, tengo 23 años de edad. Vivo en el seibo con mi madre la cual no trabaja, solo realiza algunos trabajos de limpieza en casas y con los ingresos que recibe me ha ayudado siempre. Tengo 3 hermanos pero no viven conmigo.
Actualmente estoy estudiando medicina en la UCE y elegí esa carrera porque desde pequeña quería ser doctora, es mi sueño el poder ser una gran profesional y convertirme en una persona que le pueda aportar algo a mi país. Poder ayudar a personas necesitas que no cuenten con recursos necesarios para poder recibir una buena atención medica.
Solicito el préstamo porque mi padre aunque no vive conmigo trabaja y me ayuda pero recibe muy pocos ingresos y debe mantener a sus 4 hijos. Siempre me ha brindado ayuda pero no le alcanza para mantenernos a todos.
Mi meta es ser una gran doctora, poder sacar a mi familia hacia delante y demostrarles que si tienen aspiraciones y deseo de superación pueden lograrlo. Sería para mi muy importante terminar mis estudios ya que soy la única esperanza de mi madre y poder darle una mejor calidad de vida ya que realmente se lo merece.
texts.en:
Yohanmi is a young medical student. She is requesting a loan to pay her education expenses. This is her story:

“Hello, my name is Yohanmi, and I am 23 years old. I live in El Seibo [a province in the east of the Dominican Republic] with my mother. She does not work full-time, but she does some cleaning work in houses. She has always helped me with the income she receives. I have three brothers, but they do not live with me.

I am studying medicine in the UCE [a university in the Dominican Republic]. I chose this career because I have wanted to be a doctor since I was very young. It is my dream to become a great professional and someone who can do something for my country. I would like to be able to help people in need that do not have the resources required to receive good medical care.

I am requesting this loan because, although my father does not live with me, he helps me with the little income he has, but he has to support four children. He has always helped me, but he does not have enough to support all of us.

My goal is to be a great doctor, and to be able to support my family and to show them that if they have aspirations and a desire to improve themselves, they can do it. It is very important for me to finish my studies, because I am the only hope for my mother, and I would like to be able to improve her quality of life, because she so truly deserves it.”

loans.use: to pay education expenses for medical school.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José Santos tiene 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el Caserío Huacapampa una zona rural del distrito de Cañarís, una población que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Ferreñafe que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, cultiva cafeto, es un padre emprendedor que se esfuerza junto a su familia, ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
José Santos is 27 years old and lives with his wife in the settlement of Huacapampa, a rural community in the district of Cañarís whose inhabitants work in farming, sales and livestock. It is located in the province of Ferreñafe which belongs to the Lambayeque area of the northern coast of Peru.

José has been a farmer for the past 10 years. He grows coffee. He's an enterprising father who works hard alongside his family. He has requested 3,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to purchase compost so he can maintain his coffee crop. That way he'll obtain a better produce to offer his customers, earning a higher income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase compost in order to maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en: Sabah was born in 1970. She is married and lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her retired husband. Sabah has been trying her best to support her husband, and improve their living conditions, by running her project of raising birds and selling them for the past two years. She started her project raising a small quantity of them. Now she wants to buy egg hatcheries and bird food, as this will help them spawn and will raise her sales. Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough money to buy them. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy egg hatcheries for her bird sales business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more goats

loans.name: Jamoliddin

texts.ru: Жамолиддин молодой человек в возрасте 27 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Жена Жамолиддина Мастура домохозяйка не где не работает, занимется воспитанием ребенка. Сам Жамолиддин очень трудолюбивый, добрый, спокойный человек. С пониманием относиться к семье, старается чтобы его семья не в чем не нуждалась, ради этого он трудиться как может. Жамолиддин мебельщик. Он у себя дома изготавливает национальные табуретки столы, еще занимается сборкой самодельных стенок. Жамолиддин качественно выполняет свою работу. У него очень много клиентов. Жамолиддин вот уже несколько лет подряд сотрудничает с МДО "Арванд". По началу он брал деньги в кредит для развития своей деятельности. Жамолиддин хотел бы отремонтировать свой дом, сделать косметический ремонт. Но ему для ремонта не хватает денежных средств и он подал заявку на кредит чтобы купить строительные материалы. Жамолиддин очень рад и заранее  выражает свою благодарность МДО "Арванд".
texts.en: Jamoliddin is a young man, age 27. He is married and has one child. Jamoliddin's wife, Mastura, is a housewife who works raising their child. Jamoliddin is a very hardworking, kind, and quiet man. He cares for his family and tries to ensure that they do not want for anything. Therefore, he works as hard as he can. Jamoliddin is a furniture maker. From home, he crafts traditional stools and tables. Additionally, he installs cabinetry. Jamoliddin does quality work. He has a lot of customers. For several consecutive years, Jamoliddin has been working with MDO Arvand. At first he took out loans to expand his business. Jamoliddin would like to make cosmetic repairs on his own house. However, since he doesn't have enough money, he applied for a loan to buy building materials. Jamoliddin is very happy, and he would like to express his gratitude in advance to  MDO Arvand.

loans.use: buy construction materials

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 60 años de edad posee un pequeño negocio de venta de granos básicos, aceite, café, detergentes, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en las afueras de su casa en un lugar muy transitado, por eso posee mucha clientela, vive en casa propia  con su compañera de vida, su suegra, su hijo y un nieto, Don Alfredo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para poder surtir su negocio, y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alfredo is 60 years old, and he runs a small general store where he sells basic grains, oil, coffee, detergents and other products. His shop is located close to his house in a very well-attended place, and for this reason he has many customers. He lives in his own house with his life partner, his mother-in-law, his son and a nephew. Alfredo is requesting a loan to buy more products to supply his shop, in order to earn a better income to grant his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy  basic grains, oil, coffee, detergents and other products to supply his shop.

loans.name: Zarchinoy

texts.en:
Zarchinoy is 33 years old. She is married and has three children. 

She is a business woman. She began her own business with selling fabrics in a local market one month ago. She buys fabrics in bulk from a central market and retails in a market of her region. Her husband helps her with managing the business. Zarchinoy runs her business successfully. 

Zarchinoy wants to buy fabrics for the new season. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS to buy fabrics for the new season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for the new season

loans.name: Julio Nelson

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 77 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con su esposa en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Nelson se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para los insumos que necesita para la agricultura como  abono, insecticida,  fertilizantes, urea, fungicida. Las  compras lo realizan  en Ricaurte cada semana. 
El sueño es comprar un terreno. Su desafío son los cambios climáticos En sus tiempos libres le gusta leer el periódico y ver televisión.
texts.en:
Nelson is 77-years old.  He is married and lives with his wife in Ventanas, De los Ríos Province.

Nelson is a member of the Palmasola communal bank, which is located in Ricaurte Parrish, Urdaneta Canton.  He makes his living doing agricultural and ranching work. 

Nelson earns a living in agriculture; he grows corn.  He is requesting a loan for the supplies he needs to perform his work, such as compost, insecticides, fertilizers, urea and fungicides.  He makes his purchases in Ricaurte on a weekly basis. 
Nelson's dream is to purchase a plot of land.  His challenges include climate change.  In his free time, Nelson likes to read the newspaper and watch television.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a chainsaw.

loans.name: Ingrid Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es tatiana, es una joven que desea seguir estudiando enfermería, terminar esta carrera técnica con éxito y en unos años ejercerla para llegar a ser profesional, para ayudar a la familia, la cual le ha dado todo el apoyo correspondiente y para ser un orgullo ante la sociedad. 
Ella estudio esta carrera porque siempre lo había anhelado, ya que le encanta ayudar a las personas y también porque esta carrera es muy útil en la vida, ya que le  puede ofrecer un futuro económico cómodo y a si poder cumplir todos los sueños que ella tiene. 
Este convenio kiva, es de gran ayuda para ella, ya que le ofrece un descuento que es de gran satisfacción para ella y la familia, ya que en su hogar las condiciones económicas no son las mejores, pero con este descuento la motivan mas a estudiar por la economía de su casa, para ser profesional y útil en la sociedad.
texts.en:
This is Tatiana, a young woman who wants to continue studying nursing and graduate to this technical career successfully, to practice her work and become a professional to help her family which has given her great support, and to be the pride of her society. 
She studied in this field because she has always longed to be a nurse because she loves to help people and because this career is very useful in life because it can provide a comfortable financial future to fulfill the dreams she has. 
This loan with Kiva is of great help to her, offering her a loan is a great pleasure for her and her family because, in her home, economic conditions are not the best but she is more motivated to study for the economy of her home, to be a professional, and to be helpful to society.

loans.use: to pay for her studies to become a nurse.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 37, and operates a retailing business in the market.  She has one child.  Her husband's source of income is farming and a transportation business, particularly motorcycle transport.  

Jenny offers candies, slippers and ready-to-wear clothes.  Her dream is to earn a higher income, and to save some of it for the education of her child.  To attain her dreams, she is borrowing PHP 15,000 to buy grocery items, more slippers and new styles of clothes to sell.  She knows that through the loan she requested, she will be able to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, more slippers and new styles of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Elia

texts.es: Rosa, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, y vive en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Rosa, lleva 8 años de tener su propio negocio donde hacer tortillas de maíz para vender. El negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ella ha invertido tres prestamos anteriores para su negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 7,000 lempiras para comprar maíz para la elaboración de tortillas, con esta inversión se podrá abastecer del insumo que es el maíz. Sus metas son obtener ingresos para el sustento de su familia y poderle dar mejor vida a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en: Rosa, 48, is a single mother of three children. She lives in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Rosa has been in business making tortillas to sell for 8 years. The business is located in her home. She has taken out three previous loans for her business and is currently seeking another loan for 7,000 Lempiras to purchase corn for making tortillas. This investment will supply her main ingredient for her goods, corn. Her goals are to earn an income to support her family and to be able to give a better life to her children and grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase corn for making and selling tortillas.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a 33-year-old woman from the town of Albur, Bohol. She is married with five children . The oldest is 12 while the youngest is 7 month old. Her husband works as a carpenter to support their family.

She raises and sells hogs to earn a living. To augment additional income, she also sells pork and chicken barbecue. Her business started a year ago. She is asking for a loan to buy  additional pigs and supplies for food vending like meat and vegetables. This will help Rosalinda continue her livelihood activity.

In the future, Rosalinda hopes to expand her business and support the  education of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and supplies for food vending like meat and vegetables

loans.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
Víctor, se ha decidido por otro crédito para reparar una consola que utiliza para su negocio de publicidad y cumplir con los contratos pendientes.
Víctor invirtió el crédito anterior en darle mantenimiento a su equipo de trabajo, con lo que su negocio se ha mantenido funcionando de manera constante, dándole como efecto positivo mejores ganancias, más clientes y la oportunidad de ofrecer un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Víctor has decided to get another loan in order to repair a console that he uses in his advertising business and fulfill his remaining contracts.
Víctor used the previous loan to do maintenance on his work equipment, with which he kept his business constantly afloat. This had the positive effect of bringing him better profits, more customers and the opportunity to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to repair a console.

loans.name: Emad

texts.en: Emad is 20 years old. He is living in a sector in Jordan called Madaba with his three siblings and his parents. Emad is studying for a Bachelors Degree majoring in Teaching. He is in his third year and is planning to find a job that suits his field of study after graduation, in order to start supporting his family financially.  They are facing financial crisis and cannot not help him pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cabbages, carrots, cucumbers, watermelons, melons and more.

loans.name: Zaman

texts.en: Zaman, who is 28 years old, is a married youth client from Iraq. He has a single child. He works to provide the family income while his wife takes care of their child.  Zaman owns a small shop where he sells women’s outfits. He established his business in 2011, and has gained good experience in this field through previous work at a similar shop, as an employee, until he established his own business. He now has hired an employee, and has gained an excellent reputation, thanks to the good quality and the affordable prices of his products. Zaman is requesting a youth loan of USD 1,800, which will be used to install a secondary ceiling in his shop and to increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so that he will be able keep providing his family with a better income.

loans.use: to install a secondary ceiling in his shop and to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen was born in 1981. She is married and lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Wihdat with her husband and only daughter.

Yasmeen has been trying her best to support her husband in improving their living conditions by running her own beauty salon for years. She gained this experience from working at a salon previously. 

Her salon currently needs some repairing. So she needs to paint it and to do some decorations in order to keep it clean and elegant and to attract more customers and provide them with the best services. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy new equipment and repair a few things in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Turdijon

texts.ru: Турдижон добрая, общительная женщина. Ей 62 года. Она проживает в Спитаменском районе. Турдижон мать одиночка. Она сама воспитывала пятерых детей, на сегодняшней день все ее дети семейные. Самостоятельно зарабатывают деньги и помогают маме. Сыновья Турдижона работают в Р.Ф. Сама Турдижон раньше работала в районной больнице младшей медсестрой, в данное время она пенсионерка. Кроме этого Турдижон в выходные выходит на рынок. Она продает сезонные вещи. Турдижон летом начала у себя дома перестройку. Она хочет  обустроить дом более в современном стиле. Её хотелось бы в ближайшее время закончить стройку, но Турдижону немного  не хватает денежных средств. Турдижон решила в очередной раз брать в кредит деньги и купить строительные материалы. Она клиентка МДО "Арванд" с большим стажем. Как клиентка Турдижон пунктуальная и ответственная. Турдижон очень надеется на помощь  и выражает свою благодарность за поддержку  и за доверие!
texts.en: Turdijon is a kind, sociable woman. She is 62. She lives in Spitamen. Turdijon is a single mother. She raised five children on her own, and now all of her children have their own families. She earns her own money and helps her mother. Turdijon's sons work in Russia. Turdijon used to work at the district hospital as a nursing assistant, but she is now retired. On the weekends, Turdijon goes to the market. She sells seasonal items. During the summer, Turdijon began remodeling her home. She wants to build a modern-style house. She would like to complete construction soon, but Turdijon is a bit short on funds. Turdijon decided to once again take out a loan so that she can buy building materials. She is an experienced client of MDO Arvand. As client, Turdijon is punctual and responsible. Turdijon has high hopes for help, and she is would like to express her gratitude for the support and trust!

loans.use: buy building materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer and to purchase new food products to sell.

loans.name: Maxima Graciela

texts.es:
Máxima tiene 44 años de edad  es soltera  vive con su hijO de 13 años en el Cantón Urdaneta Provincia de los Ríos.
Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte al Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Máxima se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de maíz y arroz.  Solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos y para dar mantenimiento especifico a sus siembras.
Vende sus productos en Ventanas. El sueño es comprar un terreno para sembrar cacao. El desafío que se enfrenta  el mal tiempo. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar ciclismo y criar pollos.
texts.en:
Máxima is 44 years old, single and lives with her 13-year-old son in the Urdaneta canton of the Los Ríos province.

Máxima is a member of the Palmasola communal bank, in the Palmasola area in the Ricaurte parish of Urdaneta. Here the people make a living in farming and raising livestock.

Máxima works in agriculture - she grows corn and rice. She is applying for this loan in order to buy supplies and to look after her crops.

Máxima sells her products in Ventanas. Her dream is to buy a plot of land where she can sow cacao. Máxima's challenge just now is the bad weather. In her free time, Máxima likes to cycle and raise chickens.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy carrots, chayotes, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel, tiene 31 años de edad, es casado, tiene un hijo, y reside en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando granos básicos, lleva 8 años de cultivar café. Esta producción la vende a intermediarios de la zona. Esta solicitando un segundo ciclo de préstamo que es por 25,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y sembrar un vivero de café, con el propósito de  y obtener mejores cosechas e ingresos para su familia. Su plan es cultivar mas café para ampliar su finca y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 31 years old, married, and has one boy. He lives in the municipality of Gracias, in the department of Lempira. He has always worked in agriculture, growing basic grains. He has grown coffee for eight years. He sells his coffee crop to intermediaries in the area.

Manuel is requesting this loan of 25,000 HNL to buy fertilizers and to plant a nursery of coffee plants. This is his second loan cycle. Manuel hopes to obtain better harvests and income for his family. He plans to increase the size of his coffee plantation and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to plant a nursery of coffee plants.

loans.name: Raul Alberto

texts.es:
Raúl, opta por solicitar más capital para invertirlo en su negocio, comprara variedad de ropa, para  poner a la disponibilidad de sus clientes nuevas opciones de compra.
El crédito anterior le ayudo adquirir la mercadería como golosinas, bebidas, entre otros productos con la que pudo sacar el mayor provecho de la temporada, económicamente a mejorado mucho y ha cancelado sus deudas.
texts.en:
Raúl has chosen to take out a new loan in order to invest in his business. He will buy a variety of clothes to give his new customers more options for things to buy.

Raúl's previous loan helped him to buy merchandise such as sweets, drinks and other products, helping him to take advantage of the season. Raúl's financial situation has improved greatly and he has paid off his debts.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing items.

loans.name: Akramjom

texts.ru: Акрамчон жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 49 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Живёт он со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Акрамчон сам работает учителем в местной школе. Но одной заработной платы не хватает на расходы семьи, поэтому он занимается собственным бизнесом. Он разводит и продаёт скот. Он получал кредит в Авранд в 2010 году чтобы как раз таки начать свой бизнес и закупить первых скот. И по сей день он является клиентом Арванд и добросовестно выплачивает свои обязательства по кредиту. Акрамчон рассказывает, что после того, как он начал сотрудничество с Арванд,  его жизнь изменилась в лучшую сторону. В его бизнесе ему помогает жена и старшие сыновья. Сейчас Акрамчон желает увеличить поголовье своего скота, чтобы потом иметь больше прибыли от своего бизнеса. Поэтому он в очередной раз обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Акрамчон надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Akramjom is a cheerful and hardworking 49-year-old man. He is married and has four children. He lives with his family in a small village. Akramjom works as a teacher at a local school. One salary is not enough for the family's expenses, so he runs his own business. He breeds and sells livestock. He took out a loan from Avrand in 2010 to start a business and buy his first heads of cattle. And to this day, he has remained one of Arvand's clients and has conscientiously paid his loan obligations. Akramjom says that after he began working with Arvand, his life changed for the better. His wife and older sons help with the business. Now, Akramjom wants to increase his livestock, to make his business more profitable. So once again, he asked Arvand for a loan to purchase cattle. Akramjom is hoping for a positive result, and he thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru:
Она Манзура. Ей 43 года. Манзура из маленького городка Кайрокум. Она живет вместе с сыновьями и невесткой. Муж Манзуры находится за приделами страны на заработках. Ее старший сын занимается ремонтом домов и помещений. Младшему сыну 16 лет. 
    Около 5 лет так Манзура берет заказы на кройку и шитье национальной одежды. Она любит свою работу, ей нравиться сам процесс создания одежды. Манзура хочет, чтоб ее работы стали качественнее и поэтому она решила купить новую швейную машинку за счет кредита. Манзура мечтает открыть кружок шитья для девочек. И хочет поделиться своим мастерством с другими. Она надеется на Вашу помощь и верит, что ее мечта скоро сбудется.
texts.en:
Manzura is 43 years old and lives in the small town of Kayrakum. She lives with her sons and daughter-in-law. Manzura's husband works outside the country. Her older son does repairs on houses and buildings. Her younger son is 16 years old. For about five years Manzura has been taking orders to make traditional national dresses. She loves her work, and likes the process of making clothes. 

Manzura wants to improve her work, and so decided to take a loan to buy a new sewing machine. She hopes to open a sewing circle for girls. She also wants to share her skills with others. She hopes for your help and believes that her dreams will soon come true.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Mustafokhuja

texts.ru: Мустафохужа фермер из села района Вахш. Ему 53 года. Он семейный человек и является отцом двух сыновей и трех дочерей. Мустафохужа на долгосрочной основе арендует 5 га участка земель, на часть которой он сеит пшеницу, на часть хлопок, а на остальной части у него растет сад. Доход с урожаев является единственным источником дохода семьи. Мустафохужа занимается сельским хозяйством в течение 10 лет. Он унаследовал это ремесло у своего отца. Ему нравится работать на земле и видеть плоды своих трудов. Сейчас Мустафохужа берет кредит для купли минеральных удобрений, топливо, а также семян хлопка. Он готовит землю к посевным работам. Через месяц он начнет сеять хлопок. Он надеется на Вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
